26 
29  public interface IMatrix<ComponentType>
30  {
31 
33  int RowCount { get; }
34 
36  int ColumnCount { get; }
37 
41  int Count { get; }
42 
46  ComponentType this[int i, int j] { get; set; }
47 
50  ComponentType this[int flatIndex] { get; set; }
51 
53  ComponentType[,] ToArray();
54 
56  ComponentType[][] ToJaggedArray();
57 
58  #region Operations
59 
61  void SetZero();
62 
64  void Negate();
65 
67  ComponentType Trace { get; }
68 
69  #region Norms
70 
72  double NormForbenius
73  { get; }
74 
76  [Obsolete("Use NormForbenius instead!")]
77  double NormEuclidean
78  { get; }
79 
81  double Norm
82  { get; }
83 
84  #endregion Norms
85 
86  #endregion Operations
87 
88 
89  } // interface IMatrix<T>

95  {

237  public static class MatrixExtensions
238  {
239 
240  #region ToString
241 
247  public static string ToStringReadable(this IMatrix mat, int accuracy = 4, int padding = 8)
248  {
249  return MatrixBase.ToStringReadable(mat, accuracy, padding);
250  }
251 
252 
257  public static string ToStringMath(this IMatrix mat)
258  {
259  return MatrixBase.ToStringMath(mat);
260  }
261 
268  public static string ToString(this IMatrix mat, string elementFormat)
269  {
270  return MatrixBase.ToString(mat, elementFormat);
271  }
272 
279  public static string ToStringMath(this IMatrix mat, string elementFormat)
280  {
281  return MatrixBase.ToStringMath(mat, elementFormat);
282  }
283 
284 
289  public static string ToStringNewlines(IMatrix mat)
290  {
291  return MatrixBase.ToStringNewlines(mat);
292  }
293 
300  public static string ToStringNewlines(IMatrix mat, string elementFormat)
301  {
302  return MatrixBase.ToStringNewlines(mat, elementFormat);
303  }
304 
305 
311  public static string ToStringMath1(IMatrix mat)
312  {
313  return MatrixBase.ToStringMath(mat);
314  }
315 
316  #endregion ToString

321 
322 
325  public abstract class MatrixBase: IMatrix
326  {
327 
328  #region Data
329 
331  public abstract int RowCount
332  {
333  get;
334  }
335 
337  public abstract int ColumnCount
338  {
339  get;
340  }
341 
345  public virtual int Count { get { return RowCount + ColumnCount; } }
346 
350  //public abstract double this[int i, int j]
351  //{
352  // get;
353  // set;
354  //}
355 
356 
360  public abstract MatrixBase GetCopyBase();
361 
367  public abstract MatrixBase GetNewBase(int rowCount, int columnCount);
368 
369 
372  public abstract MatrixBase GetNewBase();
373 
374 
379  public abstract VectorBase GetNewVectorBase(int length);
380 
384  public virtual IMatrix GetCopy()
385  { return GetCopyBase(); }
386 
392  public virtual IMatrix GetNew(int rowCount, int columnCount)
393  { return GetNewBase(rowCount, columnCount); }
394 
397  public virtual IMatrix GetNew()
398  { return GetNewBase(); }
399 
404  public virtual IVector GetNewVector(int length)
405  { return GetNewVectorBase(length); }
406 
408  public virtual double[,] ToArray()
409  {
410  double[,] ret = new double[RowCount, ColumnCount];
411  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
412  for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j )
413  {
414  ret[i, j] = this[i, j];
415  }
416  return ret;
417  }
418 
420  public virtual double[][] ToJaggedArray()
421  {
422  double[][] ret = new double[RowCount][];
423  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
424  {
425  ret[i] = new double[ColumnCount];
426  for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j)
427  {
428  ret[i][j] = this[i, j];
429  }
430  }
431  return ret;
432  }
433 
435  public virtual IMatrix T
436  {
437  get
438  {
439  IMatrix ret = GetNewBase(ColumnCount, RowCount);
440  Transpose(this, ret);
441  return ret;
442  }
443  }
444 
445  #endregion Data
446 
447 
448  #region Indices
449 
456  public virtual double this[int flatIndex]
457  {
458  get
459  {
460  return this[flatIndex / ColumnCount, flatIndex % ColumnCount];
461  }
462  set
463  {
464  this[flatIndex / ColumnCount, flatIndex % ColumnCount] = value;
465  }
466  }
467 
474  public virtual double this[int row, int column]
475  {
476  get
477  {
478  return this[row * ColumnCount + column];
479  }
480  set
481  {
482  this[row * ColumnCount + column] = value;
483  }
484  }
485 
486 
493  public static int Index(int dim1, int dim2, int row, int column)
494  {
495  return row * dim2 + column;
496  }
497 
503  public static int Index(IMatrix mat, int row, int column)
504  {
505  if (mat == null)
506  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix where index is looked for is not specified (null reference).");
507  return Index(mat.RowCount, mat.ColumnCount, row, column);
508  }
509 
514  public virtual int Index(int row, int column)
515  {
516  return Index(this.RowCount, this.ColumnCount, row, column);
517  }
518 
527  public static void Indices(int dim1, int dim2, int flatIndex, out int row, out int column)
528  {
529  row = flatIndex / dim2;
530  column = flatIndex % dim2;
531  }
532 
540  public static void Indices(IMatrix mat, int flatIndex, out int row, out int column)
541  {
542  if (mat == null)
543  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix where index is looked for is not specified (null reference).");
544  Indices(mat.RowCount, mat.ColumnCount, flatIndex, out row, out column);
545  }
546 
553  public virtual void Indices(int flatIndex, out int row, out int column)
554  {
555  Indices(RowCount, ColumnCount, flatIndex, out row, out column);
556  }
557 
558 
559  #endregion Indices
560 
561 
562 
563  #region Operations
564 
565  #region SetValue
566 
568  public virtual void SetZero()
569  {
570  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
571  for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j)
572  this[i, j] = 0.0;
573  }
574 
577  public virtual void SetConstant(double elementValue)
578  {
579  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
580  for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j)
581  this[i, j] = elementValue;
582  }
583 
587  public virtual void SetIdentity()
588  {
589  if (RowCount!=ColumnCount)
590  throw new InvalidOperationException("Attempt to set a non-square matrix to identity matrix.");
591  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
592  for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j)
593  {
594  if (i == j)
595  this[i, j] = 1.0;
596  else
597  this[i, j] = 0.0;
598  }
599  }
600 
602  public virtual void SetRandom()
603  {
604  SetRandom(this);
605  }
606 
609  public virtual void SetRandom(IRandomGenerator rnd)
610  {
611  SetRandom(this, rnd);
612  }
613 
614 
619  public virtual void SetDiagonal(double diagonalElement)
620  {
621  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
622  for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j)
623  {
624  if (i == j)
625  this[i, j] = diagonalElement;
626  else
627  this[i, j] = 0.0;
628  }
629  }
630 
633  public virtual void SetDiagonal(IVector diagonal)
634  {
635  SetDiagonal(this, diagonal);
636  }
637 
638  #endregion SetValue
639 
640 
641  #region QueryType
642 
644  public virtual bool IsSquare()
645  {
646  if (RowCount == ColumnCount)
647  return true;
648  return false;
649  }
650 
653  public virtual bool IsSymmetric()
654  {
655  return IsSymmetric(this);
656  }
657 
662  public virtual bool IsSymmetric(double relativeRMSTolerance = 0.0)
663  {
664  return IsSymmetric(this, relativeRMSTolerance);
665  }
666 
667 
668  #endregion QueryType
669 
670 
672  public virtual double Trace
673  {
674  get
675  {
676  if (RowCount != ColumnCount)
677  throw new InvalidOperationException("Can not calculate trace of a non-square matrix.");
678  double ret = 0.0;
679  for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
680  ret += this[i, i];
681  return ret;
682  }
683  }
684 
686  public virtual void Negate()
687  {
688  int i, j;
689  for (i = 0; i < this.RowCount; ++i)
690  for (j = 0; j < this.ColumnCount; ++j)
691  this[i, j] = -this[j, i];
692  }
693 
696  public virtual void Transpose()
697  {
698  int i, j;
699  double element;
700  if (RowCount != ColumnCount)
701  throw new InvalidOperationException("Non-square matrix can not be transposed in-place.");
702  for (i = 1; i < this.RowCount; ++i)
703  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
704  {
705  element = this[i, j];
706  this[i, j] = this[j, i];
707  this[j, i] = element;
708  }
709  }
710 
711 
712 
713  #region Norms
714 
715 
717  public virtual double NormForbenius
718  {
719  get
720  {
721  double ret = 0.0;
722  int i, j;
723  for (i = 0; i < RowCount; ++i)
724  for (j = 0; j < ColumnCount; ++j)
725  ret += this[i, j] * this[i, j];
726  return Math.Sqrt(ret);
727  }
728  }
729 
731  [Obsolete("Use NormForbenius instead!")]
732  public virtual double NormEuclidean
733  { get{ return NormForbenius; } }
734 
736  public virtual double Norm
737  { get { return NormForbenius; } }
738 
739 
740 
741  #endregion Norms
742 
743 
744 
745  #region Operations.Auxiliary
746 
747 
756  public override int GetHashCode()
757  {
758  return MatrixBase.GetHashCode(this);
759  }
760 
767  public override bool Equals(Object obj)
768  {
769  return MatrixBase.Equals(this, obj as IMatrix);
770  }
771 
775  public int GetHashFunctionInt()
776  {
777  return Util.GetHashFunctionInt(this);
778  }
779 
785  public string GetHashFunctionString()
786  {
787  return Util.GetHashFunctionString(this);
788  }
789 
790  #endregion Operations.Auxiliary
791 
792 
793 
794  #endregion Operations
795 
796 
797 
798  #region StaticOperations
799 
800 
801  private static MatrixStore _matrixStore;
802 
805  public static MatrixStore MatrixStore
806  {
807  get
808  {
809  if (_matrixStore == null)
810  {
811  lock (Util.LockGlobal)
812  {
813  if (_matrixStore == null)
814  _matrixStore = new MatrixStore(0, 0, false);
815  }
816  }
817  return _matrixStore;
818  }
819  }
820 
821 
822  #region SetValueStatic
823 
824 
827  public static void SetZero(IMatrix mat)
828  {
829  if (mat == null)
830  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to zero is not specified (null argument).");
831  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
832  for (int j = 0; j < mat.ColumnCount; ++j)
833  mat[i, j] = 0.0;
834  }
835 
839  public static void SetConstant(IMatrix mat, double elementValue)
840  {
841  if (mat == null)
842  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to zero is not specified (null argument).");
843  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
844  for (int j = 0; j < mat.ColumnCount; ++j)
845  mat[i, j] = elementValue;
846  }
847 
852  public static void SetIdentity(IMatrix mat)
853  {
854  if (mat == null)
855  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to zero is not specified (null argument).");
856  if (mat == null)
857  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to identity not specified (null matrix).");
858  if (mat.RowCount != mat.ColumnCount)
859  throw new InvalidOperationException("Attempt to set a non-square matrix to identity matrix.");
860  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
861  for (int j = 0; j < mat.ColumnCount; ++j)
862  {
863  if (i == j)
864  mat[i, j] = 1.0;
865  else
866  mat[i, j] = 0.0;
867  }
868  }
869 
873  public static void SetDiagonal(IMatrix mat, IVector diagonal)
874  {
875  if (mat == null)
876  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to zero is not specified (null argument).");
877  if (diagonal == null)
878  throw new ArgumentNullException("Vector of diagonal matrix elements is not specified (null reference).");
879  if (diagonal.Length < mat.RowCount && diagonal.Length < mat.ColumnCount ||
880  diagonal.Length > mat.RowCount && diagonal.Length > mat.ColumnCount)
881  throw new Exception("Vector of diagonal elements has incorrect dimension " + diagonal.Length
882  + " for a matrix with dimensions " + mat.RowCount + "x" + mat.ColumnCount + ".");
883  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
884  for (int j = 0; j < mat.ColumnCount; ++j)
885  {
886  if (i == j)
887  mat[i, j] = diagonal[i];
888  else
889  mat[i, j] = 0;
890  }
891  }
892 
898  public static void SetDiagonal(IMatrix mat, double diagonalElement)
899  {
900  if (mat == null)
901  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
902  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
903  for (int j = 0; j < mat.ColumnCount; ++j)
904  {
905  if (i == j)
906  mat[i, j] = diagonalElement;
907  else
908  mat[i, j] = 0.0;
909  }
910  }
911 
914  public static void SetRandom(IMatrix mat)
915  {
916  IRandomGenerator rnd = RandomGenerator.Global; // new RandGeneratorThreadSafe(1111);
917  SetRandom(mat, rnd);
918  }
919 
923  public static void SetRandom(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd = null)
924  {
925  if (mat == null)
926  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to zero is not specified (null argument).");
927  if (rnd == null)
928  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
929  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
930  double element;
931  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
932  for (int j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
933  {
934  do
935  {
936  element = rnd.NextDouble();
937  } while (element == 0.0);
938  mat[i, j] = element;
939  }
940  }
941 
944  public static void SetRandomSymmetric(IMatrix mat)
945  {
946  IRandomGenerator rnd = RandomGenerator.Global; // new RandGeneratorThreadSafe(1111);
947  SetRandomSymmetric(mat, rnd);
948  }
949 
953  public static void SetRandomSymmetric(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd)
954  {
955  if (mat == null)
956  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to symmetric random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
957  if (rnd == null)
958  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
959  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
960  if (d1 != d2)
961  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be set to random symmetric matrix is not square (dimensions: "
962  + d1 + "x" + d2 + ")");
963  double element;
964  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
965  {
966  for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j)
967  {
968  do
969  {
970  element = rnd.NextDouble();
971  } while (element == 0.0);
972  mat[i, j] = element;
973  if (i != j)
974  mat[j, i] = element;
975  }
976  }
977  }
978 
981  public static void SetRandomAntiSymmetric(IMatrix mat)
982  {
983  IRandomGenerator rnd = RandomGenerator.Global; // new RandGeneratorThreadSafe(1111);
984  SetRandomAntiSymmetric(mat, rnd);
985  }
986 
991  public static void SetRandomAntiSymmetric(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd)
992  {
993  if (mat == null)
994  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to antisymmetric random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
995  if (rnd == null)
996  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
997  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
998  if (d1 != d2)
999  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be set to random antisymmetric matrix is not square (dimensions: "
1000  + d1 + "x" + d2 + ")");
1001  double element;
1002  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1003  {
1004  mat[i, i] = 0.0;
1005  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1006  {
1007  do
1008  {
1009  element = rnd.NextDouble();
1010  } while (element == 0.0);
1011  mat[i, j] = element;
1012  mat[j, i] = -element;
1013  }
1014  }
1015  }
1016 
1019  public static void SetRandomLowerTriangular(IMatrix mat)
1020  {
1021  IRandomGenerator rnd = RandomGenerator.Global; // new RandGeneratorThreadSafe(1111);
1022  SetRandomLowerTriangular(mat, rnd);
1023  }
1024 
1028  public static void SetRandomLowerTriangular(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd)
1029  {
1030  if (mat == null)
1031  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to lower triangular random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
1032  if (rnd == null)
1033  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
1034  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
1035  double element;
1036  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1037  {
1038  for (int j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1039  {
1040  if (j > i)
1041  mat[i, j] = 0.0;
1042  else
1043  {
1044  do
1045  {
1046  element = rnd.NextDouble();
1047  } while (element == 0.0);
1048  mat[i, j] = element;
1049  }
1050  }
1051  }
1052  }
1053 
1056  public static void SetRandomUpperTriangular(IMatrix mat)
1057  {
1058  IRandomGenerator rnd = RandomGenerator.Global; // new RandGeneratorThreadSafe(1111);
1059  SetRandomUpperTriangular(mat, rnd);
1060  }
1061 
1065  public static void SetRandomUpperTriangular(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd)
1066  {
1067  if (mat == null)
1068  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to lower triangular random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
1069  if (rnd == null)
1070  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
1071  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
1072  double element;
1073  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1074  {
1075  for (int j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1076  {
1077  if (j < i)
1078  mat[i, j] = 0.0;
1079  else
1080  {
1081  do
1082  {
1083  element = rnd.NextDouble();
1084  } while (element == 0.0);
1085  mat[i, j] = element;
1086  }
1087  }
1088  }
1089  }
1090 
1093  public static void SetRandomSymmetricPositiveDefinite(IMatrix mat)
1094  {
1095  IRandomGenerator rnd = RandomGenerator.Global; // new RandGeneratorThreadSafe(1111);
1096  SetRandomSymmetricPositiveDefinite(mat, rnd);
1097  }
1098 
1110  public static void SetRandomSymmetricPositiveDefinite(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd)
1111  {
1112  if (mat == null)
1113  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be set to random positive definite matrix is not specified (null argument).");
1114  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
1115  if (d1 != d2)
1116  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be set to random positive definite matrix is not square (dimensions: "
1117  + d1 + "x" + d2 + ")");
1118  IMatrix L = null, LT = null;
1119  // Try to get auxiliary matrices from the matrix store:
1120  L = MatrixStore.TryGet();
1121  LT = MatrixStore.TryGet();
1122  if (L == LT && LT!=null)
1123  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix L and LT are the same.");
1124  // Resize if necessary:
1125  Resize(ref L, d1, d1);
1126  Resize(ref LT, d1, d1);
1127  // Set lower triangular matrix and its transpose:
1128  SetRandomLowerTriangular(L, rnd);
1129  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i) // ensure that diagonal elements are positive:
1130  {
1131  L[i, i] += 1.0;
1132  }
1133  Transpose(L, ref LT);
1134  // Set matrix as product of lower and upper triangular matrix:
1135  Multiply(L, LT, mat);
1136  // Try to put auxiliary matrixes back to matrix store:
1137  MatrixStore.TryStore(L as Matrix);
1138  MatrixStore.TryStore(LT as Matrix);
1139  }
1140 
1148  public static void SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominant(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd = null, double dominancyFactor = 100.0)
1149  {
1150  if (mat == null)
1151  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to lower triangular random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
1152  if (rnd == null)
1153  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
1154  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
1155  double element;
1156  if (dominancyFactor < 0)
1157  dominancyFactor = -dominancyFactor;
1158  else if (dominancyFactor == 0)
1159  dominancyFactor = 1.0;
1160  if (dominancyFactor < 1.0)
1161  dominancyFactor = 1.0 / dominancyFactor;
1162  double outDiagonalFactor = 0.5 * (1.0 / ((double)Math.Max(d1, d2) * dominancyFactor));
1163  for (int i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1164  {
1165  for (int j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1166  {
1167  if (i == j)
1168  {
1169  element = rnd.NextDouble();
1170  if (element < 0.5)
1171  element = 1.0 - element;
1172  mat[i, i] = element;
1173  } else
1174  {
1175  mat[i, j] = rnd.NextDouble() * outDiagonalFactor;
1176  mat[j, i] = rnd.NextDouble() * outDiagonalFactor;
1177  }
1178  }
1179  }
1180  }
1181 
1188  public static void SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominant(IMatrix mat, double dominancyFactor)
1189  {
1190  SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominant(mat, null /* rnd */, dominancyFactor);
1191  }
1192 
1200  public static void SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominantSymmetric(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd = null, double dominancyFactor = 100.0)
1201  {
1202  SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominant(mat, rnd, dominancyFactor);
1203  SymmetricPart(mat, mat);
1204  }
1205 
1212  public static void SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominantSymmetric(IMatrix mat, double dominancyFactor)
1213  {
1214  SetRandomPositiveDiagonallyDominantSymmetric(mat, null /* rnd */, dominancyFactor);
1215  }
1216 
1217 
1218  // Generation of random invertible or positive definite matrices:
1219 
1220 
1221 
1230  public static double SetRandomInvertible(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd = null)
1231  {
1232  double determinant = 1.0;
1233  if (mat == null)
1234  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to lower triangular random matrix is not specified (null argument).");
1235  if (mat.RowCount != mat.ColumnCount)
1236  throw new InvalidOperationException("Random invertible matrix can not be generated for non-square matrices.");
1237  if (rnd == null)
1238  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
1239  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
1240  IMatrix lower = new Matrix(d1, d2);
1241  IMatrix upper = new Matrix(d1, d2);
1242  for (int row = 0; row < d1; ++row)
1243  for (int col = 0; col < d2; ++col)
1244  {
1245  if (col < row)
1246  {
1247  // below diagonal
1248  lower[row, col] = rnd.NextDouble();
1249  upper[row, col] = 0.0;
1250  }
1251  else if (col > row)
1252  {
1253  // above diagonal
1254  lower[row, col] = 0.0;
1255  upper[row, col] = rnd.NextDouble();
1256  }
1257  else
1258  {
1259  // diagonal elements
1260  double element = 1.0 + rnd.NextDouble();
1261  determinant *= element;
1262  lower[row, col] = 1.0;
1263  upper[row, col] = element;
1264  }
1265  }
1266  MultiplyPlain(lower, upper, mat);
1267  return determinant;
1268  }
1269 
1270 
1271 
1279  public static double SetRandomPositiveDefiniteSymmetric(IMatrix mat, IRandomGenerator rnd = null)
1280  {
1281  double determinant = 1.0;
1282  if (mat == null)
1283  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be set to random symmetric positive definite is not specified (null argument).");
1284  if (mat.RowCount != mat.ColumnCount)
1285  throw new InvalidOperationException("Random symmetric positive definite matrix can not be generated for non-square matrices.");
1286  if (rnd == null)
1287  rnd = RandomGenerator.Global;
1288  int d1 = mat.RowCount, d2 = mat.ColumnCount;
1289  IMatrix lower = new Matrix(d1, d2);
1290  for (int row = 0; row < d1; ++row)
1291  for (int col = 0; col < d2; ++col)
1292  {
1293  if (col < row)
1294  {
1295  // below diagonal
1296  lower[row, col] = rnd.NextDouble();
1297  }
1298  else if (col > row)
1299  {
1300  // above diagonal
1301  lower[row, col] = 0.0;
1302  } else
1303  {
1304  // diagonal elements
1305  double element = 1.0 + rnd.NextDouble();
1306  determinant *= element;
1307  lower[row, col] = element;
1308  }
1309  }
1310  determinant *= determinant; // because thre are 2 factors with the same determinant
1311  MultiplyTranspMatPlain(lower, lower, mat);
1312  return determinant;
1313  }
1314 
1315 
1316 
1317  #endregion SetValueStatic
1318 
1319 
1320  #region QueryTypeStatic
1321 
1325  public static bool IsSquare(IMatrix mat)
1326  {
1327  if (mat != null)
1328  if (mat.RowCount == mat.ColumnCount)
1329  return true;
1330  return false;
1331  }
1332 
1336  public static bool IsSymmetric(IMatrix mat)
1337  {
1338  if (IsSquare(mat))
1339  {
1340  for (int i = 0; i<mat.RowCount; ++i)
1341  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1342  {
1343  if (mat[i,j]!=mat[j,i])
1344  return false;
1345  }
1346  return true;
1347  }
1348  return false;
1349  }
1350 
1356  public static bool IsSymmetric(IMatrix mat, double relativeRMSTolerance)
1357  {
1358  double smallValue = 1.0e-60;
1359  if (IsSquare(mat))
1360  {
1361  if (relativeRMSTolerance<0)
1362  relativeRMSTolerance = - relativeRMSTolerance;
1363  double sumSquares = 0.0, sumSquareDifs = 0.0;
1364  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
1365  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1366  {
1367  double m_ij = mat[i, j];
1368  double m_ji = mat[j, i];
1369  sumSquares += m_ij*m_ij + m_ji*m_ji;
1370  sumSquareDifs += 2.0 * (m_ij - m_ji) * (m_ij - m_ji);
1371  }
1372  if (Math.Sqrt(sumSquareDifs / (sumSquares + smallValue)) < relativeRMSTolerance)
1373  return true;
1374  }
1375  return false;
1376  }
1377 
1378  #endregion QueryTypeStatic
1379 
1380 
1391  public static int Compare(IMatrix m1, IMatrix m2)
1392  {
1393  if (m1 == null)
1394  {
1395  if (m2 == null)
1396  return 0;
1397  else
1398  return -1;
1399  }
1400  else if (m2 == null)
1401  {
1402  return 1;
1403  }
1404  else if (m1.RowCount < m2.RowCount)
1405  return -1;
1406  else if (m1.RowCount > m2.RowCount)
1407  return 1;
1408  else if (m1.ColumnCount < m2.ColumnCount)
1409  return -1;
1410  else if (m1.ColumnCount > m2.ColumnCount)
1411  return 1;
1412  else
1413  {
1414  int dim1 = m1.RowCount;
1415  int dim2 = m1.ColumnCount;
1416  for (int i = 0; i < dim1; ++i)
1417  for (int j=0; j<dim2; ++j)
1418  {
1419  double el1 = m1[i,j];
1420  double el2 = m2[i,j];
1421  if (el1 < el2)
1422  return -1;
1423  else if (el1 > el2)
1424  return 1;
1425  }
1426  return 0; // all elements are equal
1427  }
1428  }
1429 
1430 
1431 
1447  public static void Resize(ref IMatrix mat, IMatrix template, int rowCount, int columnCount)
1448  {
1449  if (rowCount <= 0 || columnCount <=0)
1450  {
1451  if (template == null)
1452  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix dimensions after resize are not specified (arguments less or equal to 0) and template is not specified.");
1453  else
1454  {
1455  rowCount = template.RowCount;
1456  columnCount = template.ColumnCount;
1457  }
1458  }
1459  if (mat == null)
1460  {
1461  if (template != null)
1462  mat = template.GetNew(rowCount, columnCount);
1463  else
1464  mat = new Matrix(rowCount, columnCount);
1465  }
1466  else if (mat.RowCount != rowCount || mat.ColumnCount!=columnCount)
1467  {
1468  mat = mat.GetNew(rowCount, columnCount);
1469  }
1470  }
1471 
1481  public static void Resize(ref IMatrix mat, int rowCount, int columnCount)
1482  {
1483  if (rowCount <= 0 || columnCount <=0)
1484  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix dimensions after resize are not specified (argument less or equal to 0).");
1485  if (mat == null)
1486  mat = new Matrix(rowCount, columnCount);
1487  else if (mat.RowCount!=rowCount || mat.ColumnCount!=columnCount)
1488  mat = mat.GetNew(rowCount, columnCount);
1489  }
1490 
1491 
1502  public static void Resize(ref IMatrix mat, IMatrix template)
1503  {
1504  int rowCount, columnCount;
1505  if (template == null)
1506  throw new ArgumentNullException("Template matrix is not specified in vector resize.");
1507  else
1508  {
1509  rowCount = template.RowCount;
1510  columnCount = template.ColumnCount;
1511  }
1512  if (mat == null)
1513  {
1514  mat = template.GetNew(rowCount, columnCount);
1515  } else if (mat.RowCount != rowCount || mat.ColumnCount!=columnCount)
1516  {
1517  mat = mat.GetNew(rowCount, columnCount);
1518  }
1519  }
1520 
1521 
1527  public static void CopyPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
1528  {
1529  int d1 = a.RowCount;
1530  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1531  int i, j;
1532  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1533  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1534  result[i, j] = a[i, j];
1535  }
1536 
1541  public static void Copy(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
1542  {
1543  if (a == null)
1544  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be copied is not specified (null reference).");
1545  else if (result == null)
1546  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for copy operation is not specified (null reference).");
1547  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
1548  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at copying matrices." + Environment.NewLine
1549  + " Original matrix: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
1550  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
1551  else
1552  {
1553  int d1 = a.RowCount;
1554  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1555  int i, j;
1556  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1557  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1558  result[i, j] = a[i, j];
1559  }
1560  }
1561 
1566  public static void Copy(IMatrix a, ref IMatrix result)
1567  {
1568  if (a == null)
1569  result = null;
1570  else
1571  {
1572  int d1 = a.RowCount;
1573  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1574  if (result == null)
1575  result = a.GetNew(d1, d2);
1576  else if (d1 != result.RowCount || d2 != result.ColumnCount)
1577  result = a.GetNew(d1, d2);
1578  int i, j;
1579  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1580  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1581  result[i,j] = a[i, j];
1582  }
1583  }
1584

1594  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1595  int i, j;
1596  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1597  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1598  result[i, j] = a[i, j];
1599  }

1606  {
1607  if (a == null)
1608  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be copied is not specified (null reference).");
1609  else if (result == null)
1610  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for copy operation is not specified (null reference).");
1611  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
1612  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at copying matrices." + Environment.NewLine
1613  + " Original matrix: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
1614  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
1615  else
1616  {
1617  int d1 = a.RowCount;
1618  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1619  int i, j;
1620  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1621  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1622  result[i, j] = a[i, j];
1623  }
1624  }

1633  result = null;
1634  else
1635  {
1636  int d1 = a.RowCount;
1637  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1638  if (result == null)
1639  result = new Matrix(d1, d2);
1640  else if (d1 != result.RowCount || d2 != result.ColumnCount)
1641  result = new Matrix(d1, d2);
1642  int i, j;
1643  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
1644  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1645  result[i,j] = a[i, j];
1646  }
1647  }

1672  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be copied is not specified (null reference).");
1673  else if (result == null)
1674  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for copy operation is not specified (null reference).");
1675  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
1676  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at copying matrices." + Environment.NewLine
1677  + " Original matrix: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
1678  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");

1698  else
1699  {
1700  int d1 = a.RowCount;
1701  int d2 = a.ColumnCount;
1702  if (result == null)
1703  result = new Matrix_MathNetNumercs(d1, d2);
1704  else if (d1 != result.RowCount || d2 != result.ColumnCount)
1705  result = new Matrix_MathNetNumercs(d1, d2);
1706  int i, j;

1708  for (j = 0; j < d2; ++j)
1709  result[i, j] = a[i, j];
1710  }

1720  public static void NegatePlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
1721  {
1722  int i, j;
1723  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
1724  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
1725  result[i, j] = -a[i, j];
1726  }
1727 
1733  public static void Negate(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
1734  {
1735  if (a == null)
1736  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be negated is not specified (null reference).");
1737  else if (result == null)
1738  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for negation is not specified (null reference).");
1739  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
1740  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix negation." + Environment.NewLine
1741  + " Operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
1742  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
1743  else
1744  {
1745  int i, j;
1746  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
1747  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
1748  result[i, j] = -a[i, j];
1749  }
1750  }
1751 
1757  public static void Negate(IMatrix a, ref IMatrix result)
1758  {
1759  if (a == null)
1760  result = null;
1761  else
1762  {
1763  if (result == null)
1764  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
1765  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
1766  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
1767  int i, j;
1768  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
1769  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
1770  result[i, j] = -a[i, j];
1771  }
1772  }
1773 
1774 
1775 
1782  public static void TransposePlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
1783  {
1784  if (a == result)
1785  {
1786  // Perform transposition in-place:
1787  if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
1788  {
1789  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix transpose can not be performed in-place for non-square matrices. "
1790  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
1791  }
1792  int i, j;
1793  double element;
1794  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
1795  {
1796  result[i, i] = a[i, i];
1797  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1798  {
1799  element = a[i, j];
1800  a[i, j] = a[j, i];
1801  a[j, i] = element;
1802  }
1803  }
1804  } else
1805  {
1806  int i, j;
1807  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
1808  for (j = 0; j < result.ColumnCount; ++j)
1809  {
1810  result[i, j] = a[j, i];
1811  }
1812  }
1813  }
1814 
1820  public static void Transpose(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
1821  {
1822  if (a == null)
1823  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be transposed is not specified (null reference).");
1824  else if (result == null)
1825  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for transposition is not specified (null reference).");
1826  else if (a.RowCount != result.ColumnCount || a.ColumnCount != result.RowCount)
1827  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix transpose." + Environment.NewLine
1828  + " Operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
1829  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
1830  else
1831  {
1832  if (a == result)
1833  {
1834  // Perform transposition in-place:
1835  if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
1836  {
1837  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix transpose can not be performed in-place for non-square matrices. "
1838  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
1839  }
1840  int i, j;
1841  double element;
1842  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
1843  {
1844  result[i, i] = a[i, i];
1845  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1846  {
1847  element = a[i, j];
1848  a[i, j] = a[j, i];
1849  a[j, i] = element;
1850  }
1851  }
1852  }
1853  else
1854  {
1855  int i, j;
1856  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
1857  for (j = 0; j < result.ColumnCount; ++j)
1858  {
1859  result[i, j] = a[j, i];
1860  }
1861  }
1862  }
1863  }
1864 
1870  public static void Transpose(IMatrix a, ref IMatrix result)
1871  {
1872  if (a == null)
1873  result = null;
1874  else
1875  {
1876  if (result == null)
1877  result = a.GetNew(a.ColumnCount, a.RowCount);
1878  else if (a.RowCount != result.ColumnCount || a.ColumnCount != result.RowCount)
1879  result = a.GetNew(a.ColumnCount, a.RowCount);
1880  if (a == result)
1881  {
1882  // Perform transposition in-place:
1883  if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
1884  {
1885  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix transpose can not be performed in-place for non-square matrices. "
1886  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
1887  }
1888  int i, j;
1889  double element;
1890  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
1891  {
1892  result[i, i] = a[i, i];
1893  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1894  {
1895  element = a[i, j];
1896  a[i, j] = a[j, i];
1897  a[j, i] = element;
1898  }
1899  }
1900  }
1901  else
1902  {
1903  int i, j;
1904  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
1905  for (j = 0; j < result.ColumnCount; ++j)
1906  {
1907  result[i, j] = a[j, i];
1908  }
1909  }
1910  }
1911  }
1912 
1913 
1930  public static void SymmetrizePlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix sym, IMatrix antiSym)
1931  {
1932  int dim = a.RowCount;
1933  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
1934  {
1935  // Diagonal elements:
1936  antiSym[i, i] = 0;
1937  sym[i, i] = a[i, i];
1938  double elAntiSym, elSym;
1939  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1940  {
1941  elAntiSym = 0.5 * (a[i, j] - a[j, i]);
1942  elSym = 0.5 * (a[i, j] + a[j, i]);
1943  antiSym[i, j] = elAntiSym;
1944  antiSym[j, i] = -elAntiSym;
1945  sym[i, j] = elSym;
1946  sym[j, i] = elSym;
1947  }
1948  }
1949  } // SymmetrizePlain(...)
1950 
1962  public static void Symmetrize(IMatrix a, IMatrix sym, IMatrix antiSym)
1963  {
1964  if (a == null)
1965  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be symmetrized is null.");
1966  if (sym == null)
1967  throw new ArgumentException("Symmetric result matrix is null.");
1968  else if (antiSym == null)
1969  {
1970  antiSym = sym;
1971  }
1972  if (sym == antiSym)
1973  throw new ArgumentException("Argument to store symmetric part points to the same matrix object as argument to store antisymmetric part.");
1974  if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
1975  throw new ArgumentException("Symmetrization can not be done for non-square matrices. "
1976  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
1977  if (sym.RowCount != a.RowCount || sym.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
1978  throw new ArgumentException("Dimensinos of symmetric result matrix do not match dimensions of the original.");
1979  if (antiSym.RowCount != a.RowCount || antiSym.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
1980  throw new ArgumentException("Dimensinos of antisymmetric result matrix do not match dimensions of the original.");
1981  int dim = a.RowCount;
1982  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
1983  {
1984  // Diagonal elements:
1985  antiSym[i, i] = 0;
1986  sym[i, i] = a[i, i];
1987  double elAntiSym, elSym;
1988  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1989  {
1990  elAntiSym = 0.5 * (a[i, j] - a[j, i]);
1991  elSym = 0.5 * (a[i, j] + a[j, i]);
1992  antiSym[i, j] = elAntiSym;
1993  antiSym[j, i] = -elAntiSym;
1994  sym[i, j] = elSym;
1995  sym[j, i] = elSym;
1996  }
1997  }
1998  } // SymmetrizePlain(...)
1999 
2005  public static void Symmetrize(IMatrix a, ref IMatrix sym, ref IMatrix antiSym)
2006  {
2007  if (a == null)
2008  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be symmetrized is null.");
2009  if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
2010  throw new ArgumentException("Symmetrization can not be done for non-square matrices. "
2011  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2012  int dim = a.RowCount;
2013  bool allocSym = false, allocAntiSym = false;
2014  if (sym == null)
2015  allocSym = true;
2016  else if (sym.RowCount!=dim || sym.ColumnCount != dim)
2017  allocSym = true;
2018  if (antiSym == null)
2019  allocAntiSym = true;
2020  else
2021  {
2022  if (antiSym == sym)
2023  {
2024  allocAntiSym = true;
2025  antiSym = null;
2026  if (sym == null)
2027  {
2028  // Not only that symmetric and antisymmetric storage variables point to the same matrix, but
2029  // references to the same variables are passed via these arguments. Both parts can therefore
2030  // not be decoupled by allocation, therefore exception is thrown.
2031  throw new ArgumentException("The same variable was passed as argument for storing both symmetric and antisymmetric part of the matrix.");
2032  }
2033  }
2034  if (antiSym.RowCount != dim || antiSym.ColumnCount != dim)
2035  allocAntiSym = true;
2036  }
2037  if (allocSym)
2038  sym = a.GetNew();
2039  if (allocAntiSym)
2040  antiSym = a.GetNew();
2041  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
2042  {
2043  // Diagonal elements:
2044  antiSym[i, i] = 0;
2045  sym[i, i] = a[i, i];
2046  double elAntiSym, elSym;
2047  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2048  {
2049  elAntiSym = 0.5 * (a[i, j] - a[j, i]);
2050  elSym = 0.5 * (a[i, j] + a[j, i]);
2051  antiSym[i, j] = elAntiSym;
2052  antiSym[j, i] = -elAntiSym;
2053  sym[i, j] = elSym;
2054  sym[j, i] = elSym;
2055  }
2056  }
2057  } // SymmetrizePlain(...)
2058 
2059 
2060 
2068  public static void SymmetricPartPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
2069  {
2070  // Perform symmetrization in-place:
2071  if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
2072  {
2073  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix symmetrization can not be performed for non-square matrices. "
2074  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2075  }
2076  int i, j;
2077  double element;
2078  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
2079  {
2080  result[i, i] = a[i, i];
2081  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2082  {
2083  element = 0.5*(a[i, j]+a[j,i]);
2084  result[i, j] = element;
2085  result[j, i] = element;
2086  }
2087  }
2088  } // SymmetricPartPlain
2089 
2096  public static void SymmetricPart(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
2097  {
2098  if (a == null)
2099  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be symmetrized is not specified (null reference).");
2100  else if (result == null)
2101  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for symmetrization is not specified (null reference).");
2102  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
2103  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix symmetrization." + Environment.NewLine
2104  + " Operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2105  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2106  else if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
2107  {
2108  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix symmetrization can not be performed in-place for non-square matrices. "
2109  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2110  }
2111  int i, j;
2112  double element;
2113  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
2114  {
2115  result[i, i] = a[i, i];
2116  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2117  {
2118  element = 0.5 * (a[i, j] + a[j, i]);
2119  result[i, j] = element;
2120  result[j, i] = element;
2121  }
2122  }
2123  } // SymmetricPart
2124 
2131  public static void SymmetricPart(IMatrix a, ref IMatrix result)
2132  {
2133  if (a == null)
2134  result = null;
2135  else if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
2136  {
2137  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix symmetrization can not be performed in-place for non-square matrices. "
2138  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2139  } else if (result == null)
2140  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2141  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
2142  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2143  int i, j;
2144  double element;
2145  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
2146  {
2147  result[i, i] = a[i, i];
2148  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2149  {
2150  element = 0.5 * (a[i, j] + a[j, i]);
2151  result[i, j] = element;
2152  result[j, i] = element;
2153  }
2154  }
2155  } // SymmetricPart
2156 
2165  public static void AntisymmetricPartPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
2166  {
2167  // Perform antisymmetrization in-place:
2168  int i, j, d1 = a.RowCount, d2 = a.ColumnCount;
2169  double element;
2170  if (d1 != d2)
2171  {
2172  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix antisymmetrization can not be performed for non-square matrices. "
2173  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2174  }
2175  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
2176  {
2177  result[i, i] = 0;
2178  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2179  {
2180  element = 0.5*(a[i, j]-a[j,i]);
2181  result[i, j] = element;
2182  result[j, i] = -element;
2183  }
2184  }
2185  } // SymmetricPartPlain
2186 
2194  public static void AntisymmetricPart(IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
2195  {
2196  if (a == null)
2197  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix to be antisymmetrized is not specified (null reference).");
2198  else if (result == null)
2199  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result matrix for symmetrization is not specified (null reference).");
2200  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
2201  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix symmetrization." + Environment.NewLine
2202  + " Operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2203  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2204  // Perform antisymmetrization in-place:
2205  int i, j, d1 = a.RowCount, d2 = a.ColumnCount;
2206  double element;
2207  if (d1 != d2)
2208  {
2209  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix antisymmetrization can not be performed for non-square matrices. "
2210  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2211  }
2212  for (i = 0; i < d1; ++i)
2213  {
2214  result[i, i] = 0;
2215  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2216  {
2217  element = 0.5 * (a[i, j] - a[j, i]);
2218  result[i, j] = element;
2219  result[j, i] = -element;
2220  }
2221  }
2222  } // AntisymmetricPart
2223 
2231  public static void AntisymmetricPart(IMatrix a, ref IMatrix result)
2232  {
2233  if (a == null)
2234  {
2235  result = null;
2236  return;
2237  } else if (a.RowCount != a.ColumnCount)
2238  {
2239  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix antisymmetrization can not be performed in-place for non-square matrices. "
2240  + Environment.NewLine + " Matrix dimensions: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount + ".");
2241  }
2242  else if (result == null)
2243  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2244  else if (a.RowCount != result.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != result.ColumnCount)
2245  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2246  int i, j;
2247  double element;
2248  for (i = 0; i < result.RowCount; ++i)
2249  {
2250  result[i, i] = 0;
2251  for (j = 0; j < i; ++j)
2252  {
2253  element = 0.5 * (a[i, j] - a[j, i]);
2254  result[i, j] = element;
2255  result[j, i] = -element;
2256  }
2257  }
2258  } // AntisymmetricPart
2259 
2260 
2261 
2269  public static void AddPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2270  {
2271  int i, j;
2272  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2273  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2274  result[i, j] = a[i, j] + b[i, j];
2275  }
2276 
2277 
2283  public static void Add(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2284  {
2285  if (a == null || b==null)
2286  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix summation: operand not specified (null reference).");
2287  else if (result == null)
2288  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix summation is not specified (null reference).");
2289  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount
2290  || result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=a.ColumnCount)
2291  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix summation. " + Environment.NewLine
2292  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2293  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2294  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2295  else
2296  {
2297  int i, j;
2298  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2299  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2300  result[i, j] = a[i, j] + b[i,j];
2301  }
2302  }
2303 
2311  public static void Add(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2312  {
2313  if (a == null || b==null)
2314  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix summation: operand not specified (null reference).");
2315  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2316  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix summation. " + Environment.NewLine
2317  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2318  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2319  else if (result == null)
2320  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2321  else if (result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=a.ColumnCount)
2322  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2323  int i, j;
2324  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2325  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2326  result[i, j] = a[i, j] + b[i, j];
2327  }
2328 
2336  public static void SubtractPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2337  {
2338  int i, j;
2339  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2340  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2341  result[i, j] = a[i, j] - b[i, j];
2342  }
2343 
2350  public static void Subtract(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2351  {
2352  if (a == null || b==null)
2353  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix subtraction: operand not specified (null reference).");
2354  else if (result == null)
2355  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix subtraction is not specified (null reference).");
2356  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount
2357  || result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=a.ColumnCount)
2358  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix subtraction. " + Environment.NewLine
2359  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2360  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2361  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2362  else
2363  {
2364  int i, j;
2365  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2366  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2367  result[i, j] = a[i, j] - b[i,j];
2368  }
2369  }
2370 
2378  public static void Subtract(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2379  {
2380  if (a == null || b==null)
2381  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix subtraction: operand not specified (null reference).");
2382  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2383  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix subtraction. " + Environment.NewLine
2384  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2385  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2386  else if (result == null)
2387  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2388  else if (result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=b.ColumnCount)
2389  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2390  int i, j;
2391  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2392  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2393  result[i, j] = a[i, j] - b[i,j];
2394  }

2406  public static void ArrayMultiplyPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2407  {
2408  int i, j;
2409  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2410  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2411  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * b[i, j];
2412  }
2413 
2419  public static void ArrayMultiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2420  {
2421  if (a == null || b==null)
2422  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2423  else if (result == null)
2424  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix array multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
2425  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount
2426  || result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=a.ColumnCount)
2427  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix array multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2428  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2429  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2430  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2431  else
2432  {
2433  int i, j;
2434  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2435  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2436  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * b[i,j];
2437  }
2438  }
2439 
2446  public static void ArrayMultiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2447  {
2448  if (a == null || b==null)
2449  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2450  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2451  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix array multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2452  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2453  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2454  else if (result == null)
2455  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2456  else if (result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=b.ColumnCount)
2457  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2458  int i, j;
2459  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2460  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2461  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * b[i,j];
2462  }

2471  public static void ArrayDividePlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2472  {
2473  int i, j;
2474  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2475  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2476  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / b[i, j];
2477  }
2478 
2484  public static void ArrayDivide(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2485  {
2486  if (a == null || b==null)
2487  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array division: operand not specified (null reference).");
2488  else if (result == null)
2489  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix array division is not specified (null reference).");
2490  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount
2491  || result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=a.ColumnCount)
2492  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix array division. " + Environment.NewLine
2493  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2494  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2495  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2496  else
2497  {
2498  int i, j;
2499  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2500  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2501  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / b[i,j];
2502  }
2503  }
2504 
2511  public static void ArrayDivide(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2512  {
2513  if (a == null || b==null)
2514  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array division: operand not specified (null reference).");
2515  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount || a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2516  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix array division. " + Environment.NewLine
2517  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2518  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2519  else if (result == null)
2520  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2521  else if (result.RowCount!=a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount !=b.ColumnCount)
2522  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount,a.ColumnCount);
2523  int i, j;
2524  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2525  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2526  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / b[i,j];
2527  }

2536  public static void ArrayPowerPlain(IMatrix a, double power, IMatrix result)
2537  {
2538  int i, j;
2539  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2540  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2541  result[i, j] = Math.Pow(a[i, j], power);
2542  }
2543 
2549  public static void ArrayPower(IMatrix a, double power, IMatrix result)
2550  {
2551  if (a == null)
2552  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array raise to power: operand not specified (null reference).");
2553  else if (result == null)
2554  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix array raise to power is not specified (null reference).");
2555  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
2556  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix array raise to power. " + Environment.NewLine
2557  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2558  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2559  else
2560  {
2561  int i, j;
2562  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2563  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2564  result[i, j] = Math.Pow(a[i, j], power);
2565  }
2566  }

2574  public static void ArrayPower(IMatrix a, double power, ref IMatrix result)
2575  {

2577  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array raise to power: operand not specified (null reference).");
2578  else if (result == null)
2579  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2580  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
2581  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);

2583  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2584  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2585  result[i, j] = Math.Pow(a[i, j], power);
2586  }

2595  public static void ArrayMapPlain(IMatrix a, Converter<double, double> mapping, IMatrix result)
2596  {
2597  int i, j;
2598  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2599  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2600  result[i, j] = mapping(a[i,j]);
2601  }
2602 
2608  public static void ArrayMap(IMatrix a, Converter<double, double> mapping, IMatrix result)
2609  {
2610  if (a == null)
2611  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array raise to power: operand not specified (null reference).");
2612  else if (result == null)
2613  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix array raise to power is not specified (null reference).");
2614  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
2615  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix array raise to power. " + Environment.NewLine
2616  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2617  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2618  else
2619  {
2620  int i, j;
2621  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2622  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2623  result[i, j] = mapping(a[i, j]);
2624  }
2625  }
2626 
2633  public static void ArrayMap(IMatrix a, Converter<double, double> mapping, ref IMatrix result)
2634  {
2635  if (a == null)
2636  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix array raise to power: operand not specified (null reference).");
2637  else if (result == null)
2638  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2639  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
2640  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
2641  int i, j;
2642  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2643  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
2644  result[i, j] = mapping(a[i, j]);
2645  }

2647  #endregion ArrayOperations
2648 
2649 
2650  #region MatrixProducts
2651 
2652 
2653  // MATRIX * MATRIX
2654 
2663  public static void MultiplyPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2664  {
2665  int i, j, k;
2666  double element;
2667  if (a == result || b == result)
2668  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2669  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2670  for (j = 0; j < b.ColumnCount; ++j)
2671  {
2672  element = 0.0;
2673  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
2674  element += a[i, k] * b[k, j];
2675  result[i, j] = element;
2676  }
2677  }
2678 
2686  public static void Multiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2687  {
2688  if (a == null || b == null)
2689  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2690  else if (a == result || b == result)
2691  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2692  else if (result == null)
2693  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
2694  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.RowCount
2695  || result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2696  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2697  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2698  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2699  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2700  int i, j, k;
2701  double element;
2702  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2703  for (j = 0; j < b.ColumnCount; ++j)
2704  {
2705  element = 0.0;
2706  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
2707  element += a[i, k] * b[k, j];
2708  result[i, j] = element;
2709  }
2710  }
2711 
2720  public static void Multiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2721  {
2722  if (a == null || b == null)
2723  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2724  else if (a == result || b == result)
2725  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2726  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.RowCount)
2727  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2728  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2729  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2730  else if (result == null)
2731  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, b.ColumnCount);
2732  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2733  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, b.ColumnCount);
2734  int i, j, k;
2735  double element;
2736  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2737  for (j = 0; j < b.ColumnCount; ++j)
2738  {
2739  element = 0.0;
2740  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
2741  element += a[i, k] * b[k, j];
2742  result[i, j] = element;
2743  }
2744  }
2745 
2746 
2747 
2748  // TRANSPOSED MATRIX * MATRIX
2749 
2758  public static void MultiplyTranspMatPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2759  {
2760  int i, j, k;
2761  double element;
2762  if (a == result || b == result)
2763  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Transposed matrix by matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2764  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i) // first matrix transposed!
2765  for (j = 0; j < b.ColumnCount; ++j)
2766  {
2767  element = 0.0;
2768  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k) // first matrix transposed!
2769  element += a[k, i] * b[k, j]; // first matrix transposed!
2770  result[i, j] = element;
2771  }
2772  }
2773 
2781  public static void MultiplyTranspMat(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2782  {
2783  if (a == null || b == null)
2784  throw new ArgumentNullException("Transposed matrix by matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2785  else if (a == result || b == result)
2786  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Transposed matrix by matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2787  else if (result == null)
2788  throw new ArgumentNullException("Transposed matrix by matrix multiplication: result storage for matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
2789  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount // first matrix transposed!
2790  || result.RowCount != a.ColumnCount || result.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount)
2791  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at transposed matrix by matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2792  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2793  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2794  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2795  int i, j, k;
2796  double element;
2797  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i) // first matrix transposed!
2798  for (j = 0; j < b.ColumnCount; ++j)
2799  {
2800  element = 0.0;
2801  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k) // first matrix transposed!
2802  element += a[k, i] * b[k, j]; // first matrix transposed!
2803  result[i, j] = element;
2804  }
2805  }
2806 
2815  public static void MultiplyTranspMat(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2816  {
2817  if (a == null || b == null)
2818  throw new ArgumentNullException("Transposed matrix by matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2819  else if (a == result || b == result)
2820  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Transposed matrix by matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2821  else if (a.RowCount != b.RowCount) // first matrix transposed!
2822  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at transposed matrix by matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2823  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2824  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2825  else if (result == null)
2826  result = a.GetNew(a.ColumnCount, b.ColumnCount); // first matrix transposed!
2827  else if (result.RowCount != a.ColumnCount || result.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount) // first matrix transposed!
2828  result = a.GetNew(a.ColumnCount, b.ColumnCount); // first matrix transposed!
2829  int i, j, k;
2830  double element;
2831  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i) // first matrix transposed!
2832  for (j = 0; j < b.ColumnCount; ++j)
2833  {
2834  element = 0.0;
2835  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k) // first matrix transposed!
2836  element += a[k, i] * b[k, j]; // first matrix transposed!
2837  result[i, j] = element;
2838  }
2839  }
2840 
2845  private static bool TestMultiplyTranspMat(double tolerance, bool printReports)
2846  {
2847  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3;
2848  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
2849  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d2, d1); A.SetRandom();
2850  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d2, d3); B.SetRandom();
2851  IMatrix A_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(A, ref A_T);
2852  MultiplyTranspMat(A, B, ref result);
2853  Multiply(A_T, B, ref referenceResult);
2854  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
2855  return ret;
2856  }

2860  // MATRIX * TRANSPOSED MATRIX
2861 
2870  public static void MultiplyMatTranspPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2871  {
2872  int i, j, k;
2873  double element;
2874  if (a == result || b == result)
2875  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix by transposed matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2876  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2877  for (j = 0; j < b.RowCount; ++j) // second matrix transposed!
2878  {
2879  element = 0.0;
2880  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
2881  element += a[i, k] * b[j, k]; // second matrix transposed!
2882  result[i, j] = element;
2883  }
2884  }
2885 
2893  public static void MultiplyMatTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2894  {
2895  if (a == null || b == null)
2896  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix by transposed matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2897  else if (a == result || b == result)
2898  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix by transposed matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2899  else if (result == null)
2900  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix by transposed matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
2901  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount // second matrix transposed!
2902  || result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != b.RowCount)
2903  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix by transposed matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2904  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2905  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
2906  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
2907  int i, j, k;
2908  double element;
2909  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2910  for (j = 0; j < b.RowCount; ++j) // second matrix transposed!
2911  {
2912  element = 0.0;
2913  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
2914  element += a[i, k] * b[j, k]; // second matrix transposed!
2915  result[i, j] = element;
2916  }
2917  }
2918 
2927  public static void MultiplyMatTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
2928  {
2929  if (a == null || b == null)
2930  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix by transposed matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
2931  else if (a == result || b == result)
2932  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix by transposed matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2933  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.ColumnCount) // second matrix transposed!
2934  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix by transposed matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
2935  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
2936  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
2937  else if (result == null)
2938  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, b.RowCount); // second matrix transposed!
2939  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != b.RowCount) // second matrix transposed!
2940  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, b.RowCount);
2941  int i, j, k;
2942  double element;
2943  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
2944  for (j = 0; j < b.RowCount; ++j) // second matrix transposed!
2945  {
2946  element = 0.0;
2947  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
2948  element += a[i, k] * b[j, k]; // second matrix transposed!
2949  result[i, j] = element;
2950  }
2951  }
2952 
2957  private static bool TestMultiplyMatTransp(double tolerance, bool printReports)
2958  {
2959  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3;
2960  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
2961  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d1, d2); A.SetRandom();
2962  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d3, d2); B.SetRandom();
2963  IMatrix B_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(B, ref B_T);
2964  MultiplyMatTransp(A, B, ref result);
2965  Multiply(A, B_T, ref referenceResult);
2966  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
2967  return ret;
2968  }
