2972  // TRANSPOSED MATRIX * TRANSPOSED MATRIX
2973 
2982  public static void MultiplyTranspTranspPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
2983  {
2984  int i, j, k;
2985  double element;
2986  if (a == result || b == result)
2987  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
2988  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i) // both matrices transposed!
2989  for (j = 0; j < b.RowCount; ++j) // both matrices transposed!
2990  {
2991  element = 0.0;
2992  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k) // both matrices transposed!
2993  element += a[k, i] * b[j, k]; // both matrices transposed!
2994  result[i, j] = element;
2995  }
2996  }
2997 
3005  public static void MultiplyTranspTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix result)
3006  {
3007  if (a == null || b == null)
3008  throw new ArgumentNullException("Transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
3009  else if (a == result || b == result)
3010  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
3011  else if (result == null)
3012  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
3013  else if (a.RowCount != b.ColumnCount // both matrices transposed!
3014  || result.RowCount != a.ColumnCount || result.ColumnCount != b.RowCount) // both matrices transposed!
3015  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
3016  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3017  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3018  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
3019  int i, j, k;
3020  double element;
3021  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i) // both matrices transposed!
3022  for (j = 0; j < b.RowCount; ++j) // both matrices transposed!
3023  {
3024  element = 0.0;
3025  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k) // both matrices transposed!
3026  element += a[k, i] * b[j, k]; // both matrices transposed!
3027  result[i, j] = element;
3028  }
3029  }
3030 
3039  public static void MultiplyTranspTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, ref IMatrix result)
3040  {
3041  if (a == null || b == null)
3042  throw new ArgumentNullException("Transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
3043  else if (a == result || b == result)
3044  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
3045  else if (a.RowCount != b.ColumnCount) // both matrices transposed!
3046  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at transposed matrix by transposed matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
3047  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3048  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount + ".");
3049  else if (result == null)
3050  result = a.GetNew(a.ColumnCount, b.RowCount); // both matrices transposed!
3051  else if (result.RowCount != a.ColumnCount || result.ColumnCount != b.RowCount) // both matrices transposed!
3052  result = a.GetNew(a.ColumnCount, b.RowCount); // both matrices transposed!
3053  int i, j, k;
3054  double element;
3055  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i) // both matrices transposed!
3056  for (j = 0; j < b.RowCount; ++j) // both matrices transposed!
3057  {
3058  element = 0.0;
3059  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k) // both matrices transposed!
3060  element += a[k, i] * b[j, k]; // both matrices transposed!
3061  result[i, j] = element;
3062  }
3063  }
3064 
3069  private static bool TestMultiplyTranspTransp(double tolerance, bool printReports)
3070  {
3071  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3;
3072  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
3073  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d2, d1); A.SetRandom();
3074  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d3, d2); B.SetRandom();
3075  IMatrix A_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(A, ref A_T);
3076  IMatrix B_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(B, ref B_T);
3077  MultiplyTranspTransp(A, B, ref result);
3078  Multiply(A_T, B_T, ref referenceResult);
3079  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
3080  return ret;
3081  }
3082 
3083 
3084  // MATRIX * MATRIX * MATRIX
3085 
3095  public static void MultiplyPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3096  {
3097  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3098  int
3099  m =
3100  a.RowCount,
3101  n = b.RowCount,
3102  o = b.ColumnCount,
3103  p = c.ColumnCount;
3104  if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3105  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
3106  int i, j, k, l;
3107  double element, element_bc;
3108  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3109  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3110  {
3111  element = 0.0;
3112  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3113  {
3114  element_bc = 0.0;
3115  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3116  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[l, j];
3117  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3118  }
3119  result[i, j] = element;
3120  }
3121  }
3122 
3131  public static void Multiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3132  {
3133  if (a == null || b == null || c==null)
3134  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
3135  else if (a == result || b == result || c==result)
3136  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
3137  else if (result == null)
3138  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for tripple matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
3139  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3140  int
3141  m =
3142  a.RowCount,
3143  n = b.RowCount,
3144  o = b.ColumnCount,
3145  p = c.ColumnCount;
3146  if (a.ColumnCount!=n || c.RowCount!=o || result.RowCount!=m || result.ColumnCount!=p)
3147  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
3148  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3149  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3150  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount
3151  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
3152  int i, j, k, l;
3153  double element, element_bc;
3154  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3155  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3156  {
3157  element = 0.0;
3158  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3159  {
3160  element_bc = 0.0;
3161  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3162  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[l, j];
3163  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3164  }
3165  result[i, j] = element;
3166  }
3167  }
3168 
3178  public static void Multiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, ref IMatrix result)
3179  {
3180  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3181  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
3182  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3183  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
3184  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3185  int
3186  m =
3187  a.RowCount,
3188  n = b.RowCount,
3189  o = b.ColumnCount,
3190  p = c.ColumnCount;
3191  if (a.ColumnCount != n || c.RowCount != o)
3192  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
3193  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3194  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3195  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount + ".");
3196  if (result == null)
3197  result=a.GetNew(m,p);
3198  else if (result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3199  result=a.GetNew(m,p);
3200  int i, j, k, l;
3201  double element, element_bc;
3202  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3203  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3204  {
3205  element = 0.0;
3206  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3207  {
3208  element_bc = 0.0;
3209  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3210  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[l, j];
3211  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3212  }
3213  result[i, j] = element;
3214  }
3215  }
3216 
3221  private static bool TestMultiply3(double tolerance, bool printReports)
3222  {
3223  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3, d4 = 5;
3224  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
3225  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d1, d2); A.SetRandom();
3226  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d2, d3); B.SetRandom();
3227  IMatrix C = new Matrix(d3, d4); C.SetRandom();
3228  Multiply(A, B, C, ref result);
3229  IMatrix AB = null;
3230  Multiply(A, B, ref AB);
3231  Multiply(AB, C, ref referenceResult);
3232  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
3233  return ret;
3234  }
3235 
3236 
3237  // TRANSPOSED MATRIX * MATRIX * TRANSPOSED MATRIX
3238 
3249  public static void MultiplyTranspMatTranspPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3250  {
3251  if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3252  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T) can not be done in place.");
3253  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3254  int
3255  m =
3256  a.ColumnCount, // transpose!
3257  n = b.RowCount,
3258  o = b.ColumnCount,
3259  p = c.RowCount; // transpose!
3260  int i, j, k, l;
3261  double element, element_bc;
3262  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3263  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3264  {
3265  element = 0.0;
3266  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3267  {
3268  element_bc = 0.0;
3269  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3270  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[j, l];
3271  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3272  }
3273  result[i, j] = element;
3274  }
3275  }
3276 
3286  public static void MultiplyTranspMatTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3287  {
3288  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3289  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T): operand not specified (null reference).");
3290  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3291  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix (A^T*B*C^T) multiplication can not be done in place.");
3292  else if (result == null)
3293  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T) is not specified (null reference).");
3294  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3295  int
3296  m =
3297  a.ColumnCount, // transpose!
3298  n = b.RowCount,
3299  o = b.ColumnCount,
3300  p = c.RowCount; // transpose!
3301  if (a.RowCount != n || c.ColumnCount != o // transposed a and b!
3302  || result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3303  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T). " + Environment.NewLine
3304  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3305  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3306  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount
3307  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
3308  int i, j, k, l;
3309  double element, element_bc;
3310  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3311  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3312  {
3313  element = 0.0;
3314  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3315  {
3316  element_bc = 0.0;
3317  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3318  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[j, l];
3319  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3320  }
3321  result[i, j] = element;
3322  }
3323  }
3324 
3335  public static void MultiplyTranspMatTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, ref IMatrix result)
3336  {
3337  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3338  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T): operand not specified (null reference).");
3339  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3340  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T) can not be done in place.");
3341  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3342  int
3343  m =
3344  a.ColumnCount, // transpose!
3345  n = b.RowCount,
3346  o = b.ColumnCount,
3347  p = c.RowCount; // transpose!
3348  if (a.RowCount != n || c.ColumnCount != o) // transposed a and b!
3349  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C^T). " + Environment.NewLine
3350  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3351  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3352  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount + ".");
3353  if (result == null)
3354  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3355  else if (result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3356  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3357  int i, j, k, l;
3358  double element, element_bc;
3359  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3360  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3361  {
3362  element = 0.0;
3363  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3364  {
3365  element_bc = 0.0;
3366  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3367  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[j, l];
3368  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3369  }
3370  result[i, j] = element;
3371  }
3372  }
3373 
3378  private static bool TestMultiplyTranspMatTransp(double tolerance, bool printReports)
3379  {
3380  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3, d4 = 5;
3381  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
3382  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d2, d1); A.SetRandom();
3383  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d2, d3); B.SetRandom();
3384  IMatrix C = new Matrix(d4, d3); C.SetRandom();
3385  MultiplyTranspMatTransp(A, B, C, ref result);
3386  IMatrix A_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(A, ref A_T);
3387  IMatrix C_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(C, ref C_T);
3388  IMatrix prod = null;
3389  Multiply(A_T, B, ref prod);
3390  Multiply(prod, C_T, ref referenceResult);
3391  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
3392  return ret;
3393  }
3394 
3395 
3396  // TRANSPOSED MATRIX * MATRIX * MATRIX
3397 
3408  public static void MultiplyTranspMatMatPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3409  {
3410  if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3411  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C) can not be done in place.");
3412  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3413  int
3414  m =
3415  a.ColumnCount, // transpose!
3416  n = b.RowCount,
3417  o = b.ColumnCount,
3418  p = c.ColumnCount; // transpose!
3419  int i, j, k, l;
3420  double element, element_bc;
3421  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3422  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3423  {
3424  element = 0.0;
3425  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3426  {
3427  element_bc = 0.0;
3428  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3429  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[l, j];
3430  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3431  }
3432  result[i, j] = element;
3433  }
3434  }
3435 
3445  public static void MultiplyTranspMatMat(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3446  {
3447  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3448  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C): operand not specified (null reference).");
3449  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3450  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix (A^T*B*C) multiplication can not be done in place.");
3451  else if (result == null)
3452  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C) is not specified (null reference).");
3453  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3454  int
3455  m =
3456  a.ColumnCount, // transpose!
3457  n = b.RowCount,
3458  o = b.ColumnCount,
3459  p = c.ColumnCount; // transpose!
3460  if (a.RowCount != n || c.RowCount != o // transposed a and b!
3461  || result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3462  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C). " + Environment.NewLine
3463  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3464  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3465  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount
3466  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
3467  int i, j, k, l;
3468  double element, element_bc;
3469  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3470  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3471  {
3472  element = 0.0;
3473  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3474  {
3475  element_bc = 0.0;
3476  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3477  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[l, j];
3478  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3479  }
3480  result[i, j] = element;
3481  }
3482  }
3483 
3494  public static void MultiplyTranspMatMat(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, ref IMatrix result)
3495  {
3496  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3497  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C): operand not specified (null reference).");
3498  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3499  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C) can not be done in place.");
3500  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3501  int
3502  m =
3503  a.ColumnCount, // transpose!
3504  n = b.RowCount,
3505  o = b.ColumnCount,
3506  p = c.ColumnCount; // transpose!
3507  if (a.RowCount != n || c.RowCount != o) // transposed a and b!
3508  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B*C). " + Environment.NewLine
3509  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3510  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3511  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount + ".");
3512  if (result == null)
3513  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3514  else if (result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3515  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3516  int i, j, k, l;
3517  double element, element_bc;
3518  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3519  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3520  {
3521  element = 0.0;
3522  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3523  {
3524  element_bc = 0.0;
3525  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3526  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[l, j];
3527  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3528  }
3529  result[i, j] = element;
3530  }
3531  }

3538  private static bool TestMultiplyTranspMatMat(double tolerance, bool printReports)
3539  {
3540  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3, d4 = 5;
3541  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
3542  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d2, d1); A.SetRandom();
3543  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d2, d3); B.SetRandom();
3544  IMatrix C = new Matrix(d3, d4); C.SetRandom();
3545  MultiplyTranspMatMat(A, B, C, ref result);
3546  IMatrix A_T = null; Matrix.Transpose(A, ref A_T);
3547  IMatrix prod = null;
3548  Multiply(A_T, B, ref prod);
3549  Multiply(prod, C, ref referenceResult);
3550  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
3551  return ret;
3552  }

3573  o = b.ColumnCount,
3574  p = c.RowCount;
3575  if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3576  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");

3579  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3580  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3581  {
3582  element = 0.0;
3583  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3584  {
3585  element_bc = 0.0;
3586  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)

3588  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3589  }

3603  public static void MultiplyMatMatTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3604  {
3605  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3606  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix-matrix-transpose multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
3607  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3608  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");
3609  else if (result == null)
3610  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for tripple matrix-matrix-transpose multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
3611  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3612  int
3613  m =
3614  a.RowCount,
3615  n = b.RowCount,
3616  o = b.ColumnCount,
3617  p = c.RowCount;
3618  if (a.ColumnCount != n || c.ColumnCount != o || result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3619  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix-matrix-transpose multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
3620  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3621  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3622  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount
3623  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
3624  int i, j, k, l;
3625  double element, element_bc;
3626  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3627  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3628  {
3629  element = 0.0;
3630  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3631  {
3632  element_bc = 0.0;
3633  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3634  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[j, l];
3635  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3636  }
3637  result[i, j] = element;
3638  }
3639  }

3651  public static void MultiplyMatMatTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, ref IMatrix result)
3652  {
3653  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3654  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
3655  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3656  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix-matrix-transpose multiplication can not be done in place.");
3657  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3658  int
3659  m =
3660  a.RowCount,
3661  n = b.RowCount,
3662  o = b.ColumnCount,
3663  p = c.RowCount;
3664  if (a.ColumnCount != n || c.ColumnCount != o)
3665  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix-matrix-transpose multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
3666  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3667  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3668  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount + ".");
3669  if (result == null)
3670  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3671  else if (result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3672  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3673  int i, j, k, l;
3674  double element, element_bc;
3675  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3676  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3677  {
3678  element = 0.0;
3679  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3680  {
3681  element_bc = 0.0;
3682  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3683  element_bc += b[k, l] * c[j, l];
3684  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3685  }
3686  result[i, j] = element;
3687  }
3688  }

3695  {
3696  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3, d4 = 5;
3697  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
3698  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d1, d2); A.SetRandom();
3699  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d2, d3); B.SetRandom();
3700  IMatrix C = new Matrix(d4, d3); C.SetRandom();
3701  MultiplyMatMatTransp(A, B, C, ref result);
3702  IMatrix C_T = null; Transpose(C, ref C_T);
3703  IMatrix AB = null;
3704  Multiply(A, B, ref AB);
3705  Multiply(AB, C_T, ref referenceResult);
3706  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
3707  return ret;
3708  }

3763  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3764  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication can not be done in place.");

3766  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for tripple matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");

3768  int
3769  m = a.RowCount,
3770  n = b.ColumnCount,
3771  o = b.RowCount,
3772  p = c.ColumnCount;
3773  if (a.ColumnCount != n || c.RowCount != o || result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)

3783  {

3785  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3786  {
3787  element_bc = 0.0;
3788  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3789  element_bc += b[l, k] * c[l, j];
3790  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3791  }
3792  result[i, j] = element;
3793  }

3821  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount

3823  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount + ".");

3835  {
3836  element_bc = 0.0;
3837  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)

3839  element += a[i, k] * element_bc;
3840  }

3850  {
3851  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3, d4 = 5;
3852  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
3853  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d1, d2); A.SetRandom();
3854  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d3, d2); B.SetRandom();
3855  IMatrix C = new Matrix(d3, d4); C.SetRandom();
3856  MultiplyMatTranspMat(A, B, C, ref result);
3857  IMatrix B_T = null; Transpose(B, ref B_T);
3858  IMatrix ABT = null;
3859  Multiply(A, B_T, ref ABT);
3860  Multiply(ABT, C, ref referenceResult);
3861  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
3862  return ret;

3877  public static void MultiplyTranspTranspTranspPlain(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3878  {
3879  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3880  int
3881  m = a.ColumnCount,
3882  n = b.ColumnCount,
3883  o = b.RowCount,
3884  p = c.RowCount;
3885  if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3886  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T) can not be done in place.");
3887  int i, j, k, l;
3888  double element, element_bc;
3889  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3890  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3891  {
3892  element = 0.0;
3893  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3894  {
3895  element_bc = 0.0;
3896  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3897  element_bc += b[l, k] * c[j, l];
3898  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3899  }
3900  result[i, j] = element;
3901  }
3902  }
3903 
3904 
3913  public static void MultiplyTranspTranspTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, IMatrix result)
3914  {
3915  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3916  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T): operand not specified (null reference).");
3917  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3918  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T) can not be done in place.");
3919  else if (result == null)
3920  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T) is not specified (null reference).");
3921  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3922  int
3923  m = a.ColumnCount,
3924  n = b.ColumnCount,
3925  o = b.RowCount,
3926  p = c.RowCount;
3927  if (a.RowCount != n || c.ColumnCount != o || result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3928  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T). " + Environment.NewLine
3929  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3930  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3931  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount
3932  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
3933  int i, j, k, l;
3934  double element, element_bc;
3935  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3936  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3937  {
3938  element = 0.0;
3939  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3940  {
3941  element_bc = 0.0;
3942  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3943  element_bc += b[l, k] * c[j, l];
3944  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3945  }
3946  result[i, j] = element;
3947  }
3948  }
3949 
3950 
3960  public static void MultiplyTranspTranspTransp(IMatrix a, IMatrix b, IMatrix c, ref IMatrix result)
3961  {
3962  if (a == null || b == null || c == null)
3963  throw new ArgumentNullException("Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T): operand not specified (null reference).");
3964  else if (a == result || b == result || c == result)
3965  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T) can not be done in place.");
3966  // Store dimensions of involved matrix factors:
3967  int
3968  m = a.ColumnCount,
3969  n = b.ColumnCount,
3970  o = b.RowCount,
3971  p = c.RowCount;
3972  if (a.RowCount != n || c.ColumnCount != o)
3973  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at tripple matrix multiplication (A^T*B^T*C^T). " + Environment.NewLine
3974  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
3975  + ", second operand: " + b.RowCount + "x" + b.ColumnCount
3976  + ", third operand: " + c.RowCount + "x" + c.ColumnCount + ".");
3977  if (result == null)
3978  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3979  else if (result.RowCount != m || result.ColumnCount != p)
3980  result = a.GetNew(m, p);
3981  int i, j, k, l;
3982  double element, element_bc;
3983  for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
3984  for (j = 0; j < p; ++j)
3985  {
3986  element = 0.0;
3987  for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
3988  {
3989  element_bc = 0.0;
3990  for (l = 0; l < o; ++l)
3991  element_bc += b[l, k] * c[j, l];
3992  element += a[k, i] * element_bc;
3993  }
3994  result[i, j] = element;
3995  }
3996  }
3997 
4002  private static bool TestMultiplyTranspTranspTransp(double tolerance, bool printReports)
4003  {
4004  int d1 = 2, d2 = 4, d3 = 3, d4 = 5;
4005  IMatrix result = null, referenceResult = null;
4006  IMatrix A = new Matrix(d2, d1); A.SetRandom();
4007  IMatrix B = new Matrix(d3, d2); B.SetRandom();
4008  IMatrix C = new Matrix(d4, d3); C.SetRandom();
4009  MultiplyTranspTranspTransp(A, B, C, ref result);
4010  IMatrix A_T = null; Transpose(A, ref A_T);
4011  IMatrix B_T = null; Transpose(B, ref B_T);
4012  IMatrix C_T = null; Transpose(C, ref C_T);
4013  IMatrix ATBT = null;
4014  Multiply(A_T, B_T, ref ATBT);
4015  Multiply(ATBT, C_T, ref referenceResult);
4016  bool ret = CheckTestResult(result, referenceResult, tolerance, printReports);
4017  return ret;
4018  }
4019 
4020 
4021 
4022 
4023 
4024  #endregion MatrixProducts
4025 
4026 
4027  #region MatrixVectorProducts
4028 
4029  // MATRIX * VECTOR
4030 
4039  public static void MultiplyPlain(IMatrix a, IVector b, IVector result)
4040  {
4041  int i, k;
4042  if (b == result)
4043  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix-vector multiplication can not be done in place.");
4044  double element;
4045  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4046  {
4047  element = 0.0;
4048  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
4049  element += a[i, k] * b[k];
4050  result[i] = element;
4051  }
4052  }
4053 
4061  public static void Multiply(IMatrix a, IVector b, IVector result)
4062  {
4063  if (a == null || b == null)
4064  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix by vector multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4065  else if (b == result)
4066  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix-vector multiplication can not be done in place.");
4067  else if (result == null)
4068  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4069  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.Length
4070  || result.Length != a.RowCount)
4071  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix by vector multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4072  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4073  + ", second operand dim.: " + b.Length
4074  + ", result dim: " + result.Length + ".");
4075  int i, k;
4076  double element;
4077  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4078  {
4079  element = 0.0;
4080  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
4081  element += a[i, k] * b[k];
4082  result[i] = element;
4083  }
4084  }
4085 
4094  public static void Multiply(IMatrix a, IVector b, ref IVector result)
4095  {
4096  if (a == null || b == null)
4097  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix by vector multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4098  else if (b == result)
4099  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix-vector multiplication can not be done in place.");
4100  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.Length)
4101  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4102  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4103  + ", second operand dim.: " + b.Length + ".");
4104  else if (result == null)
4105  result = a.GetNewVector(a.RowCount);
4106  else if (result.Length != a.RowCount)
4107  result = a.GetNewVector(a.RowCount);
4108  int i, k;
4109  double element;
4110  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4111  {
4112  element = 0.0;
4113  for (k = 0; k < a.ColumnCount; ++k)
4114  element += a[i, k] * b[k];
4115  result[i] = element;
4116  }
4117  }

4129  public static void MultiplyTranspVecPlain(IMatrix a, IVector b, IVector result)
4130  {
4131  int i, k;
4132  if (b == result)
4133  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix-vector multiplication can not be done in place.");
4134  double element;
4135  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i)
4136  {
4137  element = 0.0;
4138  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k)
4139  element += a[k, i] * b[k];
4140  result[i] = element;
4141  }
4142  }
4143 
4151  public static void MultiplyTranspVec(IMatrix a, IVector b, IVector result)
4152  {
4153  if (a == null || b == null)
4154  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix by vector multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4155  else if (b == result)
4156  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix-vector multiplication can not be done in place.");
4157  else if (result == null)
4158  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4159  else if (a.RowCount != b.Length
4160  || result.Length != a.ColumnCount)
4161  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix by vector multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4162  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4163  + ", second operand dim.: " + b.Length
4164  + ", result dim: " + result.Length + ".");
4165  int i, k;
4166  double element;
4167  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i)
4168  {
4169  element = 0.0;
4170  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k)
4171  element += a[k, i] * b[k];
4172  result[i] = element;
4173  }
4174  }

4184  public static void MultiplyTranspVec(IMatrix a, IVector b, ref IVector result)
4185  {
4186  if (a == null || b == null)
4187  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix by vector multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4188  else if (b == result)
4189  throw new ArgumentException("Result the same as operand. Matrix-vector multiplication can not be done in place.");
4190  else if (a.ColumnCount != b.Length)
4191  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4192  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4193  + ", second operand dim.: " + b.Length + ".");
4194  else if (result == null)
4195  result = a.GetNewVector(a.ColumnCount);
4196  else if (result.Length != a.ColumnCount)
4197  result = a.GetNewVector(a.ColumnCount);
4198  int i, k;
4199  double element;
4200  for (i = 0; i < a.ColumnCount; ++i)
4201  {
4202  element = 0.0;
4203  for (k = 0; k < a.RowCount; ++k)
4204  element += a[k, i] * b[k];
4205  result[i] = element;
4206  }
4207  }

4209  // TRANSPOSED VECTOR * MATRIX * VECTOR
4210 
4220  public static double MultiplyPlain(IVector left, IMatrix a, IVector right)
4221  {
4222  int i, j;
4223  double ret = 0.0;
4224  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4225  {
4226  double rightElement = 0.0;
4227  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4228  rightElement += a[i, j] * right[j];
4229  ret += left[i]*rightElement;
4230  }
4231  return ret;
4232  }
4233 
4242  public static double Multiply(IVector left, IMatrix a, IVector right)
4243  {
4244  if (a == null || left==null || right == null)
4245  throw new ArgumentNullException("Vector-matrix-vector multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4246  else if (a.RowCount!=left.Length || a.ColumnCount != right.Length)
4247  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix by vector multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4248  + " Left vector operand: " + left.Length
4249  + ", Matrix operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4250  + ", Right vector operand: " + right.Length + ".");
4251  int i, j;
4252  double ret = 0.0;
4253  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4254  {
4255  double rightElement = 0.0;
4256  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4257  rightElement += a[i, j] * right[j];
4258  ret += left[i] * rightElement;
4259  }
4260  return ret;
4261  }
4262 
4273  public static double Multiply(IVector left, IMatrix a, IVector right, ref IVector result)
4274  {
4275  if (a == null || left == null || right == null)
4276  throw new ArgumentNullException("Vector-matrix-vector multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4277  else if (a.RowCount != left.Length || a.ColumnCount != right.Length)
4278  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix by vector multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4279  + " Left vector operand: " + left.Length
4280  + ", Matrix operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4281  + ", Right vector operand: " + right.Length + ".");
4282  int i, j;
4283  double ret = 0.0;
4284  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4285  {
4286  double rightElement = 0.0;
4287  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4288  rightElement += a[i, j] * right[j];
4289  ret += left[i] * rightElement;
4290  }
4291  return ret;
4292  }

4312  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4313  {
4314  result[i, j] = a[i,j]*b;
4315  }
4316  }

4328  else if (result == null)
4329  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix-scalar multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4330  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4331  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix-scalar multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4332  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4333  + ", second operand: scalar"
4334  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4335  int i, j;

4337  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4338  {
4339  result[i, j] = a[i,j]*b;
4340  }

4351  {

4353  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix-scalar multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4354  else if (result == null)
4355  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4356  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4357  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4358  int i, j;
4359  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4360  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4361  {
4362  result[i, j] = a[i,j]*b;
4363  }

4398  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4399  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix-scalar multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4400  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4401  + ", second operand: scalar"
4402  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");

4405  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4406  {
4407  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * b;
4408  }

4422  else if (result == null)
4423  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4424  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4425  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4426  int i, j;
4427  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4428  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4429  {
4430  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * b;
4431  }

4466  public static void MultiplyDiagonal(IVector diag, IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
4467  {
4468  if (a == null || diag == null)
4469  throw new ArgumentNullException("Diagonal - matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4470  else if (result == null)
4471  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for diagonal - matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4472  else if (diag.Length != a.RowCount
4473  || result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4474  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at diagonal - matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4475  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4476  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length
4477  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4478  int i, j;
4479  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4480  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4481  {
4482  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * diag[i];
4483  }
4484  }

4493  public static void MultiplyDiagonal(IVector diag, IMatrix a, ref IMatrix result)
4494  {

4496  throw new ArgumentNullException("Diagonal - matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4497  else if (diag.Length != a.RowCount)
4498  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at diagonal - matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4499  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4500  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length
4501  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4502  else if (result == null)
4503  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4504  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4505  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4506  int i, j;
4507  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4508  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4509  {
4510  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * diag[i];
4511  }

4542  public static void MultiplyInverseDiagonal(IVector diag, IMatrix a, IMatrix result)
4543  {

4545  throw new ArgumentNullException("Inverse diagonal - matrix multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4546  else if (result == null)
4547  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for inverse diagonal - matrix multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4548  else if (diag.Length != a.RowCount
4549  || result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4550  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at inverse diagonal - matrix multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4551  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4552  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length
4553  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4554  int i, j;

4556  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4557  {
4558  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / diag[i];
4559  }
4560  }

4577  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");

4580  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4581  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);

4619  public static void MultiplyDiagonal(IMatrix a, IVector diag, IMatrix result)
4620  {

4622  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix - diagonal multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4623  else if (result == null)
4624  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix -diagonal multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4625  else if (diag.Length!=a.ColumnCount
4626  || result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4627  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix - diagonal multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4628  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4629  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length
4630  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4631  int i, j;
4632  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4633  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4634  {
4635  result[i, j] = a[i, j] * diag[j];
4636  }

4646  public static void MultiplyDiagonal(IMatrix a, IVector diag, ref IMatrix result)
4647  {
4648  if (a == null || diag == null)
4649  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix - diagonal multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4650  else if (diag.Length != a.ColumnCount)
4651  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix - diagonal multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4652  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4653  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length

4669  // MATRIX * INVERSE DIAGONAL
4670 
4679  public static void MultiplyInverseDiagonalPlain(IMatrix a, IVector diag, IMatrix result)
4680  {
4681  int i, j;
4682  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4683  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4684  {
4685  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / diag[j];
4686  }
4687  }
4688 
4695  public static void MultiplyInverseDiagonal(IMatrix a, IVector diag, IMatrix result)
4696  {
4697  if (a == null || diag == null)
4698  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix - inverse diagonal multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4699  else if (result == null)
4700  throw new ArgumentNullException("Result storage for matrix - inverse diagonal multiplication is not specified (null reference).");
4701  else if (diag.Length!=a.ColumnCount
4702  || result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4703  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix - inverse diagonal multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4704  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4705  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length
4706  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4707  int i, j;
4708  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4709  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4710  {
4711  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / diag[j];
4712  }
4713  }
4714 
4722  public static void MultiplyInverseDiagonal(IMatrix a, IVector diag, ref IMatrix result)
4723  {
4724  if (a == null || diag == null)
4725  throw new ArgumentNullException("Matrix - inverse diagonal multiplication: operand not specified (null reference).");
4726  else if (diag.Length != a.ColumnCount)
4727  throw new ArgumentException("Dimension mismatch at matrix - inverse diagonal multiplication. " + Environment.NewLine
4728  + " First operand: " + a.RowCount + "x" + a.ColumnCount
4729  + ", second operand: " + diag.Length
4730  + ", result: " + result.RowCount + "x" + result.ColumnCount + ".");
4731  else if (result == null)
4732  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4733  else if (result.RowCount != a.RowCount || result.ColumnCount != a.ColumnCount)
4734  result = a.GetNew(a.RowCount, a.ColumnCount);
4735  int i, j;
4736  for (i = 0; i < a.RowCount; ++i)
4737  for (j = 0; j < a.ColumnCount; ++j)
4738  {
4739  result[i, j] = a[i, j] / diag[j];
4740  }
4741  }
4742 
4743 
4744 
4745  #endregion DiagonalMatrixProducts
4746 
4747 
4748 
4749 
4750  #region Auxiliary
4751 
4756  public static int GetHashCode(IMatrix mat)
4757  {
4758  if (mat == null)
4759  return int.MaxValue;
4760  int dim1 = mat.RowCount;
4761  int dim2 = mat.ColumnCount;
4762  if (dim1 < 1 || dim2 < 1)
4763  {
4764  return int.MaxValue - 1 - Math.Abs(dim1 * dim2) - Math.Abs(dim2);
4765  }
4766  int ret = 0;
4767  for (int i = 0; i < dim1; i++)
4768  {
4769  for (int j = 0; j < dim2; j++)
4770  {
4771  ret ^= mat[i, j].GetHashCode(); ;
4772  }
4773  }
4774  return ret;
4775  }
4776 
4788  public static bool Equals(IMatrix m1, IMatrix m2)
4789  {
4790  if (m1 == null)
4791  {
4792  if (m2 == null)
4793  return true;
4794  else
4795  return false;
4796  }
4797  else
4798  {
4799  int dim1 = m1.RowCount;
4800  int dim2 = m1.ColumnCount;
4801  if (m2.RowCount != dim1 || m2.ColumnCount!=dim2)
4802  return false;
4803  else
4804  {
4805  for (int i = 0; i < dim1; i++)
4806  for (int j=0; j<dim2; j++)
4807  {
4808  if (m1[i, j] != m2[i, j])
4809  return false;
4810  }
4811  return true;
4812  }
4813  }
4814  }
4815 
4820  public static int GetHashFunctionInt(IMatrix mat)
4821  {
4822  return Util.GetHashFunctionInt(mat);
4823  }
4824 
4829  public static string GetHashFunctionString(IMatrix mat)
4830  {
4831  return Util.GetHashFunctionString(mat);
4832  }

4882 
4888  public static string ToStringReadable(IMatrix mat, int accuracy = 4, int padding = 8)
4889  {
4890  if (mat == null)
4891  return Util.NullRepresentationString;
4892  string accStr = "F" + accuracy.ToString();
4893  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
4894 
4895  // string s = "";
4896  for (int i = 0; i < mat.RowCount; ++i)
4897  {
4898  for (int j = 0; j < mat.ColumnCount; ++j)
4899  sb.Append(mat[i, j].ToString(accStr).PadLeft(padding) + " ");
4900  sb.AppendLine();
4901  }
4902  return sb.ToString();
4903  }
4904 
4905 
4906 
4910  public static string ToStringNewlines(IMatrix mat)
4911  {
4912  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
4913  if (mat == null)
4914  sb.Append("{}");
4915  else
4916  {
4917  int d1 = mat.RowCount - 1;
4918  int d2 = mat.ColumnCount - 1;
4919  sb.Append('{' + Environment.NewLine);
4920  for (int i = 0; i <= d1; ++i)
4921  {
4922  sb.Append(" {");
4923  for (int j = 0; j <= d2; ++j)
4924  {
4925  sb.Append(mat[i, j].ToString(null, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));
4926  if (j < d2)
4927  sb.Append(", ");
4928  }
4929  sb.Append("}");
4930  if (i < d1)
4931  sb.Append(", " + Environment.NewLine);
4932  }
4933  sb.Append("}" + Environment.NewLine);
4934  }
4935  return sb.ToString();
4936  }
4937 
4938 
4944  public static string ToStringNewlines(IMatrix mat, string elementFormat)
4945  {
4946  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
4947  if (mat == null)
4948  sb.Append("{}");
4949  else
4950  {
4951  int d1 = mat.RowCount - 1;
4952  int d2 = mat.ColumnCount - 1;
4953  sb.Append('{' + Environment.NewLine);
4954  for (int i = 0; i <= d1; ++i)
4955  {
4956  sb.Append(" {");
4957  for (int j = 0; j <= d2; ++j)
4958  {
4959  sb.Append(mat[i, j].ToString(elementFormat, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));
4960  if (j < d2)
4961  sb.Append(", ");
4962  }
4963  sb.Append("}");
4964  if (i < d1)
4965  sb.Append(", " + Environment.NewLine);
4966  }
4967  sb.Append("}" + Environment.NewLine);
4968  }
4969  return sb.ToString();
4970  }
4971 
4976  public static string ToString(IMatrix mat)
4977  {

4979  }
4980 
4985  public static string ToStringMath(IMatrix mat)
4986  {
4987  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
4988  if (mat == null)
4989  sb.Append("{}");
4990  else
4991  {
4992  int d1 = mat.RowCount - 1;
4993  int d2 = mat.ColumnCount - 1;
4994  sb.Append('{');
4995  for (int i = 0; i <= d1; ++i)
4996  {
4997  sb.Append("{");
4998  for (int j = 0; j <= d2; ++j)
4999  {
5000  sb.Append(mat[i, j].ToString(null, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));
5001  if (j < d2)
5002  sb.Append(", ");
5003  }
5004  sb.Append("}");
5005  if (i < d1)
5006  sb.Append(", ");
5007  }
5008  sb.Append("}");
5009  }
5010  return sb.ToString();
5011  }
5012 
5019  public static string ToString(IMatrix mat, string elementFormat)
5020  {
5021  return ToStringMath(mat, elementFormat);
5022  }
5023 
5030  public static string ToStringMath(IMatrix mat, string elementFormat)
5031  {
5032  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
5033  if (mat == null)
5034  sb.Append("{}");
5035  else
5036  {
5037  int d1 = mat.RowCount - 1;
5038  int d2 = mat.ColumnCount - 1;
5039  sb.Append('{');
5040  for (int i = 0; i <= d1; ++i)
5041  {
5042  sb.Append("{");
5043  for (int j = 0; j <= d2; ++j)
5044  {
5045  sb.Append(mat[i, j].ToString(elementFormat, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));
5046  if (j < d2)
5047  sb.Append(", ");
5048  }
5049  sb.Append("}");
5050  if (i < d1)
5051  sb.Append(", ");
5052  }
5053  sb.Append("}");
5054  }
5055  return sb.ToString();
5056  }

5066  }
5067 
5073  public static void SaveJson(IMatrix mat, string filePath, bool append)
5074  {
5075  MatrixDtoBase dtoOriginal = new MatrixDtoBase();
5076  dtoOriginal.CopyFrom(mat);
5077  ISerializer serializer = new SerializerJson();
5078  serializer.Serialize<MatrixDtoBase>(dtoOriginal, filePath, append);
5079  }
5080 
5084  public static void LoadJson(string filePath, ref IMatrix matRestored)
5085  {
5086  ISerializer serializer = new SerializerJson();
5087  MatrixDtoBase dtoRestored = serializer.DeserializeFile<MatrixDtoBase>(filePath);
5088  dtoRestored.CopyTo(ref matRestored);
5089  }

5161  #region Operators_Overloading
5162 
5163 
5165  public static MatrixBase operator +(MatrixBase m)
5166  {
5167  if (m == null)
5168  return null;
5169  else
5170  return m.GetCopyBase();
5171  }
5172 
5174  public static MatrixBase operator -(MatrixBase m)
5175  {
5176  if (m == null)
5177  return null;
5178  else
5179  {
5180  MatrixBase ret = m.GetCopyBase();
5181  ret.Negate();
5182  return ret;
5183  }
5184  }
5185 
5187  public static MatrixBase operator +(MatrixBase a, MatrixBase b)
5188  {
5189  MatrixBase ret = a.GetCopyBase();
5190  Add(a, b, ret);
5191  return ret;
5192  }
5193 
5194 
5196  public static MatrixBase operator -(MatrixBase a, MatrixBase b)
5197  {
5198  MatrixBase ret = a.GetCopyBase();
5199  Subtract(a, b, ret);
5200  return ret;
5201  }
5202 
5203 
5204 
5206  public static MatrixBase operator *(MatrixBase a, MatrixBase b)
5207  {
5208  if (a == null)
5209  return null;
5210  else if (b == null)
5211  return null;
5212  MatrixBase ret = a.GetNewBase(a.RowCount, b.ColumnCount);
5213  Multiply(a, b, ret);
5214  return ret;
5215  }
5216 
5218  public static VectorBase operator *(MatrixBase a, VectorBase b)
5219  {
5220  VectorBase ret = b.GetNewBase();
5221  Multiply(a, b, ret);
5222  return ret;
5223  }
5224 
5226  public static MatrixBase operator *(MatrixBase a, double b)
5227  {
5228  MatrixBase ret = a.GetNewBase();
5229  MatrixBase.Multiply(a, b, ret);
5230  return ret;
5231  }
5232 
5234  public static MatrixBase operator *(double a, MatrixBase b)
5235  {
5236  MatrixBase ret = b.GetNewBase();
5237  Multiply(b, a, ret);
5238  return ret;
5239  }
5240 
5242  public static MatrixBase operator /(MatrixBase a, double b)
5243  {
5244  MatrixBase ret = a.GetNewBase();
5245  Divide(a, b, ret);
5246  return ret;
5247  }
5248 
5249 
5250 
5251  #endregion // Operators_Overloading
5252 
5253 
5254 
5255  #region LuDecomposition
5256 
5257 
5258 
5265  public static double DeterminantSlow(IMatrix A)
5266  {
5267  int[] permutations = null;
5268  IMatrix LU = null;
5269  return Determinant(A, ref permutations, ref LU);
5270  }
5271 
5281  public static double Determinant(IMatrix A, ref int[] auxPermutations, ref IMatrix auxLU)
5282  {
5283  if (A == null)
5284  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix whose determinant is calculateed is not specified (nulll reference).");
5285  else if (A.RowCount != A.ColumnCount || A.RowCount < 1)
5286  throw new ArgumentException("Invalid dimensions of matrix whose determinant is calculated. Should be square with dimension greater than 0.");
5287  int toggle = 0;
5288  LuDecompose(A, out toggle, ref auxPermutations, ref auxLU);
5289  return LuDeterminant(auxLU, toggle);
5290  }
5291 
5292 
5303  public static void LuDecompose(IMatrix A, out int toggle, ref int[] perm, ref IMatrix result)
5304  {
5305  if (A == null)
5306  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to LU-decompose is not specified (null reference).");
5307  int dim = A.RowCount;
5308  if (dim != A.ColumnCount)
5309  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to LU-decompose is a non-square mattrix");
5310  if (perm == null)
5311  perm = new int[dim];
5312  else if (perm.Length != dim)
5313  perm = new int[dim];
5314  if (object.ReferenceEquals(A, result))
5315  throw new ArgumentException("Result matrix is the same as inpuut matrix. Can not be done in place.");
5316  MatrixBase.Copy(A, ref result); // prepare a copy to work on, resize performed if necessary
5317  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i) { perm[i] = i; } // prepare row permutation array (initialize to identity)
5318 
5319  toggle = 1; // toggle will tracks row swaps. +1 for even, -1 for odd, use by determinant calculation
5320 
5321  for (int j = 0; j < dim - 1; ++j)
5322  {
5323  // Iterate over columns:
5324  double colMax = Math.Abs(result[j, j]); // find largest value in column j
5325  int rowMaxCol = j;
5326  for (int i = j + 1; i < dim; ++i)
5327  {
5328  if (result[i, j] > colMax)
5329  {
5330  colMax = result[i, j];
5331  rowMaxCol = i;
5332  }
5333  }
5334  if (rowMaxCol != j) // if the largest value is not on pivot, swap rows
5335  {
5336  for (int iCol = 0; iCol < dim; ++iCol)
5337  {
5338  double rowEl = result[rowMaxCol, iCol];
5339  result[rowMaxCol, iCol] = result[j, iCol];
5340  result[j, iCol] = rowEl;
5341  }
5342  int tmp = perm[rowMaxCol]; // swap permutation array entries correspondingly
5343  perm[rowMaxCol] = perm[j];
5344  perm[j] = tmp;
5345 
5346  toggle = -toggle; // adjust the toggle
5347  }
5348  if (Math.Abs(result[j, j]) < 1.0E-20) // if diagonal element after swap is zero,throw exception
5349  throw new InvalidOperationException("Zero diagonal term in LU decomposition, matrix is singular.");
5350 
5351  for (int i = j + 1; i < dim; ++i)
5352  {
5353  result[i, j] /= result[j, j];
5354  for (int k = j + 1; k < dim; ++k)
5355  {
5356  result[i, k] -= result[i, j] * result[j, k];
5357  }
5358  }
5359  } // loop over columns
5360 
5361  } // LuDecompose
5362 
5372  protected static void LuSolveNoPermutationsPlain(IMatrix luMatrix, IVector b, IVector x)
5373  {
5374  int n = luMatrix.RowCount;
5375  VectorBase.CopyPlain(b, x);
5376  for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i)
5377  {
5378  double sum = x[i];
5379  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
5380  sum -= luMatrix[i, j] * x[j];
5381  x[i] = sum;
5382  }
5383 
5384  x[n - 1] /= luMatrix[n - 1, n - 1];
5385  for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; --i)
5386  {
5387  double sum = x[i];
5388  for (int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j)
5389  sum -= luMatrix[i, j] * x[j];
5390  x[i] = sum / luMatrix[i, i];
5391  }
5392  }
5393 
5402  public static void LuSolve(IMatrix luMatrix, int[] perm, IVector b, ref IVector auxVec, ref IVector x)
5403  {
5404  if (luMatrix == null)
5405  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
5406  if (perm == null)
5407  throw new ArgumentException("Permutation array is not specified.");
5408  int dim = luMatrix.RowCount;
5409  if (luMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
5410  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
5411  if (perm.Length != dim)
5412  throw new ArgumentException("Length of permutation array in does not correspond to dimension of the LU decomposed matrix.");
5413  if (x == null)
5414  x = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5415  if (x.Length != dim)
5416  x = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5417  if (auxVec == null)
5418  auxVec = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5419  if (auxVec.Length != dim)
5420  auxVec = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5421  if (object.ReferenceEquals(b, x))
5422  throw new ArgumentException("Input and output vectors are the same. Can not be done in place.");
5423  else if (object.ReferenceEquals(b, auxVec) || object.ReferenceEquals(x, auxVec))
5424  throw new ArgumentException("Auxiliary vector the same as input or output. Needs separate instance.");
5425  // Permute b according to perm & store it in auxVec:
5426  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5427  auxVec[i] = b[perm[i]];
5428  // Solve the system with permuted right-hand sides by calling the helper function:
5429  LuSolveNoPermutationsPlain(luMatrix, auxVec, x);
5430  }
5431 
5432 
5445  public static void LuSolve(IMatrix luMatrix, int[] perm, IMatrix B, ref IVector auxVec, ref IVector auxRight,
5446  ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix X)
5447  {
5448  if (luMatrix == null)
5449  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
5450  if (perm == null)
5451  throw new ArgumentException("Permutation array is not specified.");
5452  int dim = luMatrix.RowCount;
5453  if (B == null)
5454  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
5455  if (B.RowCount != dim)
5456  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides does not have as many rows as there are equations.");
5457  int numSystems = B.ColumnCount;
5458  if (luMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
5459  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
5460  if (perm.Length != dim)
5461  throw new ArgumentException("Length of permutation array in does not correspond to dimension of the LU decomposed matrix.");
5462  if (auxVec == null)
5463  auxVec = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5464  if (auxVec.Length != dim)
5465  auxVec = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5466  if (auxRight == null)
5467  auxRight = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5468  if (auxRight.Length != dim)
5469  auxRight = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5470  if (auxX == null)
5471  auxX = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5472  if (auxX.Length != dim)
5473  auxX = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5474  if (X == null)
5475  X = luMatrix.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
5476  if (X.RowCount != dim || X.ColumnCount != numSystems)
5477  X = luMatrix.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
5478  if (object.ReferenceEquals(luMatrix, X) || object.ReferenceEquals(luMatrix, B) || object.ReferenceEquals(B, X))
5479  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place.");
5480  if (object.ReferenceEquals(auxVec, auxRight) || object.ReferenceEquals(auxVec, auxX) || object.ReferenceEquals(auxRight, auxX))
5481  throw new ArgumentException("Auxiliary vectors are the same references. Need separate instances.");
5482  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < numSystems; ++whichSystem)
5483  {
5484  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
5485  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
5486  auxRight[j] = B[j, whichSystem];
5487  // Solve the system with this vector:
5488  LuSolve(luMatrix, perm, auxRight, ref auxVec, ref auxX);
5489  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
5490  X[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
5491  }
5492  }
5493 
5503  public static void LuInverse(IMatrix luMatrix, int[] perm, ref IVector auxRight, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix res)
5504  {
5505  if (luMatrix == null)
5506  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
5507  if (perm == null)
5508  throw new ArgumentException("Permutation array is not specified.");
5509  int dim = luMatrix.RowCount;
5510  if (luMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
5511  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
5512  if (perm.Length != dim)
5513  throw new ArgumentException("Length of permutation array in does not correspond to dimension of the LU decomposed matrix.");
5514  if (auxRight == null)
5515  auxRight = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5516  if (auxRight.Length != dim)
5517  auxRight = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5518  if (auxX == null)
5519  auxX = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5520  if (auxX.Length != dim)
5521  auxX = luMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
5522  if (res == null)
5523  res = luMatrix.GetNew(dim, dim);
5524  if (res.RowCount != dim || res.ColumnCount != dim)
5525  res = luMatrix.GetNew(dim, dim);
5526  if (object.ReferenceEquals(luMatrix, res))
5527  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place.");
5528  if (object.ReferenceEquals(auxRight, auxX))
5529  throw new ArgumentException("Auxiliary vectors are the same references. Need separate instances.");
5530  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5531  {
5532  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
5533  {
5534  if (i == perm[j])
5535  auxRight[j] = 1.0;
5536  else
5537  auxRight[j] = 0.0;
5538  }
5539  LuSolveNoPermutationsPlain(luMatrix, auxRight, auxX);
5540  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
5541  res[j, i] = auxX[j];
5542  }
5543  }
5544 
5551  public static double LuDeterminant(IMatrix luMatrix, int toggle)
5552  {
5553  if (luMatrix == null)
5554  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: Matrix containing LU decomposition is not specified.");
5555  int dim = luMatrix.RowCount;
5556  if (luMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
5557  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
5558  if (toggle != -1 && toggle != 1)
5559  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: toggle should be either -1 or 1.");
5560  double result = toggle;
5561  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5562  result *= luMatrix[i, i];
5563  return result;
5564  }
5565 
5566 
5574  public static void LuExtractLower(IMatrix matLu, ref IMatrix result)
5575  {
5576  if (matLu == null)
5577  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing LU decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
5578  int dim = matLu.RowCount;
5579  if (matLu.ColumnCount != dim)
5580  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
5581  if (result == null)
5582  result = matLu.GetNew(dim, dim);
5583  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
5584  result = matLu.GetNew(dim, dim);
5585  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matLu, result))
5586  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
5587  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5588  {
5589  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
5590  {
5591  if (i == j)
5592  result[i, j] = 1.0;
5593  else if (i > j)
5594  result[i, j] = matLu[i, j];
5595  else
5596  result[i, j] = 0.0;
5597  }
5598  }
5599  }
5600 
5608  public static IMatrix LuExtractUpper(IMatrix matLu, ref IMatrix result)
5609  {
5610  if (matLu == null)
5611  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing LU decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
5612  int dim = matLu.RowCount;
5613  if (matLu.ColumnCount != dim)
5614  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
5615  if (result == null)
5616  result = matLu.GetNew(dim, dim);
5617  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
5618  result = matLu.GetNew(dim, dim);
5619  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matLu, result))
5620  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
5621  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5622  {
5623  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
5624  {
5625  if (i <= j)
5626  result[i, j] = matLu[i, j];
5627  else
5628  result[i, j] = 0.0;
5629  }
5630  }
5631  return result;
5632  }
5633 
5639  public static void PermutationArrayToMatrix(int[] perm, ref IMatrix res)
5640  {
5641  if (perm == null)
5642  throw new ArgumentException("Permutation array not specified (null reference).");
5643  if (res == null)
5644  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix where permutation matrix is to be stored is not specified (null referrence).");
5645  int dim = perm.Length;
5646  if (dim == 0)
5647  throw new ArgumentException("Length of permutation array is 0.");
5648  if (res.RowCount != dim || res.ColumnCount != dim)
5649  res = res.GetNew(dim, dim);
5650  MatrixBase.SetZero(res);
5651  // Convert Doolittle perm array to corresponding perm matrix
5652  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5653  res[i, perm[i]] = 1.0;
5654  }
5655 
5662  public static void Permute(IMatrix A, int[] permutations, ref IMatrix result)
5663  {
5664  if (A == null)
5665  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix whose rows should be permuted is not specified (null reference).");
5666  int numRows = A.RowCount;
5667  int numColumns = A.ColumnCount;
5668  if (result == null)
5669  result = A.GetNew(numRows, numColumns);
5670  else if (result.RowCount != numRows || result.ColumnCount != numColumns)
5671  result = A.GetNew(numRows, numColumns);
5672  if (object.ReferenceEquals(A, result))
5673  throw new ArgumentException("Result matrix is the same as original.");
5674  for (int row = 0; row < numRows; ++row)
5675  {
5676  for (int col = 0; col < numColumns; ++col)
5677  {
5678  result[row, col] = A[permutations[row], col];
5679  }
5680  }
5681  } // Permute()
5682 
5691  public static void UnPermute(IMatrix Apermuted, int[] permutations, ref int[] auxArray, ref IMatrix result)
5692  {
5693  if (Apermuted == null)
5694  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix whose rows should be permuted is not specified (null reference).");
5695  int numRows = Apermuted.RowCount;
5696  int numColumns = Apermuted.ColumnCount;
5697  if (result == null)
5698  result = Apermuted.GetNew(numRows, numColumns);
5699  else if (result.RowCount != numRows || result.ColumnCount != numColumns)
5700  result = Apermuted.GetNew(numRows, numColumns);
5701  if (auxArray == null)
5702  auxArray = new int[numRows];
5703  else if (auxArray.Length != numRows)
5704  auxArray = new int[numRows];
5705  if (object.ReferenceEquals(permutations, auxArray))
5706  throw new ArgumentException("Auxiliary array is the same as the permutations array.");
5707  if (object.ReferenceEquals(Apermuted, result))
5708  throw new ArgumentException("Result matrix is the same as the permuted matrix.");
5709  for (int i = 0; i < permutations.Length; ++i)
5710  auxArray[permutations[i]] = i;
5711  for (int row = 0; row < numRows; ++row)
5712  {
5713  for (int col = 0; col < numColumns; ++col)
5714  {
5715  result[row, col] = Apermuted[auxArray[row], col];
5716  }
5717  }
5718  } // UnPermute()
5719 
5720 
5721  #region LuDecomposition.Tests
5722 
5741  public static bool TestLuDecomposition(int dim, int numRepetitions = 1, double tol = 1e-6, int outputLevel = 0,
5742  IRandomGenerator randomGenerator = null, IMatrix A = null, IVector b = null)
5743  {
5744  bool passed = true;
5745  if (tol <= 0)
5746  tol = 1.0e-6;
5747  double smallNumber = 1e-20; // e.g. for guarding division by 0
5748  StopWatch1 t = new StopWatch1();
5749  try
5750  {
5751  double determinant = 0;
5752  if (randomGenerator == null)
5753  randomGenerator = RandomGenerator.Global;
5754  if (numRepetitions < 1)
5755  numRepetitions = 1;
5756  if (A != null)
5757  {
5758  dim = A.RowCount;
5759  determinant = DeterminantSlow(A); // reference calculation of determinant (since it is not provided in this case)
5760  }
5761  else if (b != null)
5762  dim = b.Length;
5763  if (outputLevel >= 1)
5764  {
5765  if (numRepetitions < 2)
5766  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LU decomposition..." + Environment.NewLine);
5767  else
5768  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LU decomposition (" + numRepetitions + " repetitions)..."
5769  + Environment.NewLine);
5770  }
5771  for (int repetition = 0; repetition < numRepetitions; ++repetition)
5772  {
5773  if (numRepetitions > 1 && outputLevel >= 1)
5774  {
5775  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "REPETITION No. " + repetition + " of the LU decomposition test..." + Environment.NewLine);
5776  }
5777  t.Start();
5778  if (A == null || repetition > 1)
5779  {
5780  A = new Matrix(dim, dim);
5781  determinant = MatrixBase.SetRandomInvertible(A, randomGenerator);
5782  }
5783  if (b == null || repetition > 1)
5784  {
5785  b = new Vector(dim);
5786  VectorBase.SetRandom(b);
5787  }
5788  if (A.RowCount != dim || A.ColumnCount != dim || b.Length != dim)
5789  throw new ArgumentException("Provided matrix and/or right/hand sides are not of correct dimensions.");
5790  t.Stop();
5791  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5792  {
5793  Console.WriteLine("Preparation of test input done in " + t.Time + "s (CPU: ", t.CpuTime + ").");
5794  Console.WriteLine("Dimension of the matrix for LU testing decomposition: " + dim + "." + Environment.NewLine);
5795  }
5796  IMatrix LU = new Matrix(dim, dim);
5797  int[] permutations = new int[dim];
5798  int toggle = 0;
5799  t.Start();
5800  LuDecompose(A, out toggle, ref permutations, ref LU);
5801  t.Stop();
5802  // Check the product:
5803  IMatrix product = null;
5804  IMatrix diffMat = null;
5805  IMatrix lower = null;
5806  IMatrix upper = null;
5807  LuExtractLower(LU, ref lower);
5808  LuExtractUpper(LU, ref upper);
5809  Multiply(lower, upper, ref product);
5810  IMatrix restored = null;
5811  int[] auxArray1 = null;
5812  UnPermute(product, permutations, ref auxArray1, ref restored); // use a custom method with the perm array to unscramble LU
5813  MatrixBase.Subtract(restored, A, ref diffMat);
5814  double relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (A.NormForbenius + smallNumber);
5815  if (relativeError > tol)
5816  passed = false;
5817  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5818  {
5819  Console.WriteLine("LU decompositin calculated in "
5820  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + "s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
5821  if (relativeError > tol)
5822  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: product of lower and upperr does not match original, relative error = "
5823  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
5824  Console.WriteLine("Product of factors: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
5825  }
5826  // Check solution of system of equations:
5827  IVector x = null;
5828  IVector auxVec1 = null;
5829  t.Start();
5830  LuSolve(LU, permutations, b, ref auxVec1, ref x);
5831  t.Stop();
5832  IVector testVec = null;
5833  IVector diffVec = null;
5834  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, x, ref testVec);
5835  VectorBase.Subtract(testVec, b, ref diffVec);
5836  relativeError = diffVec.Norm / (b.Norm + smallNumber);
5837  if (relativeError > tol)
5838  passed = false;
5839  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5840  {
5841  Console.WriteLine("Equations solved (just back substitution) in "
5842  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
5843  if (relativeError > tol)
5844  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: solution of system of equations not correct, relative error = "
5845  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
5846  Console.WriteLine("Solution of system of equations: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
5847  }
5848  // Check calculation of determinant:
5849 
5850  t.Start();
5851  double detCalc = LuDeterminant(LU, toggle);
5852  t.Stop();
5853  relativeError = Math.Abs(detCalc - determinant) / (Math.Abs(determinant) + smallNumber);
5854  if (relativeError > tol)
5855  passed = false;
5856  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5857  {
5858  Console.WriteLine("Determinant caluclated from decomposition in "
5859  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
5860  if (relativeError > tol)
5861  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of determinant not correct, relative error = "
5862  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
5863  Console.WriteLine("Calculation of determinant from decomposition: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
5864  }
5865  // Check calculation of inverse matrix (directly):
5866  IMatrix inverseMat = null;
5867  IVector auxVec2 = null;
5868  t.Start();
5869  LuInverse(LU, permutations, ref auxVec1, ref auxVec2, ref inverseMat);
5870  t.Stop();
5871  IMatrix identityMat = Matrix.Identity(dim);
5872  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, inverseMat, ref product);
5873  Matrix.Subtract(product, identityMat, ref diffMat);
5874  relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (Math.Sqrt((double)dim));
5875  if (relativeError > tol)
5876  passed = false;
5877  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5878  {
5879  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse directly from decomposition in "
5880  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
5881  if (relativeError > tol)
5882  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of matrix inverse not correct, relative error = "
5883  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
5884  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse directly from decomposition: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
5885  }
5886  // Check calculation of inverse matrix (through solutions of equations with identity right-hand side):
5887  IVector auxVec3 = null;
5888  MatrixBase.SetZero(inverseMat);
5889  t.Start();
5890  LuSolve(LU, permutations, identityMat, ref auxVec1, ref auxVec2, ref auxVec3, ref inverseMat);
5891  t.Stop();
5892  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, inverseMat, ref product);
5893  Matrix.Subtract(product, identityMat, ref diffMat);
5894  relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (Math.Sqrt((double)dim));
5895  if (relativeError > tol)
5896  passed = false;
5897  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5898  {
5899  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse through equation solving in "
5900  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
5901  if (relativeError > tol)
5902  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of matrix inverse through equation solving not correct, relative error = "
5903  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
5904  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse through equation solving: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
5905  }
5906  } // loop over repetitions
5907  }
5908  catch (Exception ex)
5909  {
5910  passed = false;
5911  if (outputLevel >= 0)
5912  {
5913  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: Exception throwin in the LU test." +
5914  Environment.NewLine + " Message: " + ex.Message);
5915  }
5916  }
5917  if (outputLevel >= 1)
5918  {
5919  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Total time spent for test operations: "
5920  + t.TotalTime.ToString("G4") + " s (CPU: " + t.TotalCpuTime.ToString("G4") + " s)." + Environment.NewLine);
5921  if (passed)
5922  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LU decomposition completed SUCCESSFULLY." + Environment.NewLine);
5923  else
5924  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LU decomposition completed with ERRORS." + Environment.NewLine);
5925  }
5926  return passed;
5927  } // TestLuDecomposition()
5928 
5931  public static void TestLuDecompositionDemo()
5932  {
5933  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Begin LU decomposition demo." + Environment.NewLine);
5934 
5935  int dim = 4;
5936  IMatrix m = new Matrix(dim, dim);
5937  m[0, 0] = 3.0; m[0, 1] = 7.0; m[0, 2] = 2.0; m[0, 3] = 5.0;
5938  m[1, 0] = 1.0; m[1, 1] = 8.0; m[1, 2] = 4.0; m[1, 3] = 2.0;
5939  m[2, 0] = 2.0; m[2, 1] = 1.0; m[2, 2] = 9.0; m[2, 3] = 3.0;
5940  m[3, 0] = 5.0; m[3, 1] = 4.0; m[3, 2] = 7.0; m[3, 3] = 1.0;
5941 
5942  Console.WriteLine("System matrix = " + Environment.NewLine + m.ToStringReadable());
5943 
5944  int[] perm = new int[dim];
5945  int toggle;
5946  IMatrix luMatrix = m.GetNew(dim, dim);
5947  LuDecompose(m, out toggle, ref perm, ref luMatrix);
5948 
5949  IMatrix lower = null;
5950  IMatrix upper = null;
5951 
5952  LuExtractLower(luMatrix, ref lower);
5953  LuExtractUpper(luMatrix, ref upper);
5954 
5955  Console.WriteLine("The (combined) LUP decomposition of m is" + Environment.NewLine + luMatrix.ToStringReadable());
5956  Console.WriteLine("The decomposition permutation array is: " + perm.ToString());
5957  Console.WriteLine("The decomposition toggle value is: " + toggle);
5958  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "The lower part of LU is " + Environment.NewLine + lower.ToStringReadable());
5959  Console.WriteLine("The upper part of LU is " + Environment.NewLine + upper.ToStringReadable());
5960 
5961  IVector auxRight = null;
5962  IVector auxX = null;
5963 
5964  // Cslvulsyion of inverse:
5965  IMatrix inverse = null;
5966  LuInverse(luMatrix, perm, ref auxRight, ref auxX, ref inverse);
5967  Console.WriteLine("Inverse of m computed from its decomposition is " + Environment.NewLine + inverse.ToStringReadable());
5968  IMatrix prod = m.GetNew();
5969  MatrixBase.Multiply(inverse, m, ref prod);
5970  // Console.WriteLine("Product of matrix and its inverse is\n" + MatrixAsString(prod));
5971  // Test inverse correctness:
5972  IMatrix diff = m.GetNew();
5973  MatrixBase.SetIdentity(diff);
5974  MatrixBase.Subtract(prod, diff, ref diff);
5975  Console.WriteLine("Error norm for matrix inverse: " + (diff.NormForbenius).ToString() + Environment.NewLine);
5976 
5977  // Calculate inverse in another way - by solbving multiple systems of equations with right-hand
5978  // sides defined by identity matrix:
5979 
5980  inverse = null;
5981  IVector auxVec = null;
5982  IMatrix B = m.GetNew(dim, dim);
5983  MatrixBase.SetIdentity(B);
5984  LuSolve(luMatrix, perm, B, ref auxVec, ref auxRight, ref auxX, ref inverse);
5985  Console.WriteLine("Inverse of m computed by explicit equation solving (identity right-hand) is " + Environment.NewLine + inverse.ToStringReadable());
5986  prod = null;
5987  MatrixBase.Multiply(inverse, m, ref prod);
5988  // Test inverse correctness:
5989  MatrixBase.SetIdentity(diff);
5990  MatrixBase.Subtract(prod, diff, ref diff);
5991  Console.WriteLine("Inverse by solving with matrix right-hand sides, error norm: " + (diff.NormForbenius).ToString() + Environment.NewLine);
5992 
5993  double det = LuDeterminant(luMatrix, toggle);
5994  Console.WriteLine("Determinant of m computed via decomposition = " + det.ToString("F1"));
5995 
5996  double[] bArray = new double[] { 49.0, 30.0, 43.0, 52.0 };
5997 
5998  IVector b = new Vector(bArray);
5999  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Right-hand side vector: " + b.ToStringMath());
6000 
6001  Console.WriteLine("Solving system via decomposition...");
6002  IVector x = null;
6003  LuSolve(luMatrix, perm, b, ref auxRight, ref x);
6004 
6005  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Solution is x = " + x.ToStringMath());
6006 
6007  // Insight in matrix decomposition concepts:
