6008  IMatrix lu = null;
6009  Multiply(lower, upper, ref lu);
6010  IMatrix orig = null;
6011  int[] auxArray = null;
6012  UnPermute(lu, perm, ref auxArray, ref orig); // use a custom method with the perm array to unscramble LU
6013  MatrixBase.Subtract(orig, m, ref diff);
6014  if (diff.NormForbenius < 0.000000001)
6015  Console.WriteLine("\nProduct of L and U successfully unpermuted using perm array.");
6016  else
6017  Console.WriteLine("\nPruduct of L and U unpermuted UNSUCCESSFULLY using perm array.");
6018 
6019  IMatrix permMatrix = m.GetNew(dim, dim);
6020  PermutationArrayToMatrix(perm, ref permMatrix); // convert the perm array to a matrix
6021  MatrixBase.Multiply(permMatrix, lu, ref orig); // another way to unscramble
6022  MatrixBase.Subtract(orig, m, ref diff);
6023  if (diff.NormForbenius < 0.000000001)
6024  Console.WriteLine("\nProduct of L and U successfully unpermuted using perm matrix.");
6025  else
6026  Console.WriteLine("\nPruduct of L and U unpermuted UNSUCCESSFULLY using permutation matrix.");
6027 
6028  Console.WriteLine("\nEnd of matrix decomposition demo.\n");
6029  // Console.ReadLine();
6030  } // TestLuDecompositionDemo()
6031 
6032  #endregion LuDecomposition.Tests
6033 
6034 
6035  #endregion LuDecomposition
6036 
6037 
6038  #region LdltDecomposition
6039 
6040 
6049  public static bool LdltDecompose(IMatrix A, ref IMatrix result, double tol = 1e-12)
6050  {
6051  if (tol <= 0)
6052  tol = 1.0e-12;
6053  if (A == null)
6054  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be LDLT decomposed is not specified (null reference).");
6055  int dim = A.RowCount;
6056  if (A.ColumnCount != dim)
6057  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be LDLT decomposed is not a square matrix.");
6058  if (result == null)
6059  result = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
6060  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6061  result = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
6062 
6063  if (!object.ReferenceEquals(A, result))
6064  MatrixBase.CopyPlain(A, result);
6065  for (int j = 0; j < dim; j++)
6066  {
6067  double dj = result[dim * j + j];
6068  for (int k = 0; k < j; k++)
6069  {
6070  double ajk = result[j * dim + k];
6071  dj -= ajk * ajk * result[dim * k + k];
6072  }
6073 
6074  result[dim * j + j] = dj;
6075  if (Math.Abs(dj) < tol)
6076  return false;
6077 
6078  double djInv = 1.0 / dj;
6079 
6080  for (int i = j + 1; i < dim; i++)
6081  {
6082  double lij = result[i * dim + j];
6083  for (int k = 0; k < j; k++)
6084  lij -= result[i * dim + k] * result[j * dim + k] * result[k * dim + k];
6085 
6086  double element = lij * djInv;
6087  result[i * dim + j] = element;
6088  result[j * dim + i] = element; // also populate symmetric elment
6089  }
6090  }
6091  //for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++)
6092  //{
6093  // // Symmetrically populate above diagonal:
6094  // for (int j = i + 1; j < dim; ++j)
6095  // {
6096  // result[i, j] = result[j, i];
6097  // }
6098  //}
6099 
6100  return true;
6101  }
6102 
6111  public static void LdltSolve(IMatrix decomposed, IVector b, ref IVector x)
6112  {
6113  if (decomposed == null)
6114  throw new ArgumentException("LDLT decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
6115  int dim = decomposed.RowCount;
6116  if (decomposed.ColumnCount != dim)
6117  throw new ArgumentException("Decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
6118  if (b == null)
6119  throw new ArgumentException("Vector of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
6120  if (b.Length != dim)
6121  throw new ArgumentException("Vector of right-hand sides is of inconsistent dimentions.");
6122  if (x == null)
6123  x = b.GetNew(dim);
6124  else if (x.Length != dim)
6125  x = b.GetNew(dim);
6126  if (!object.ReferenceEquals(x, b))
6127  VectorBase.Copy(b, x);
6128  for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++)
6129  {
6130  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++)
6131  x[i] -= x[j] * decomposed[i * dim + j];
6132  }
6133 
6134  for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++)
6135  x[i] /= decomposed[i * dim + i];
6136 
6137  for (int i = dim; i >= 0; i--)
6138  {
6139  for (int j = i + 1; j < dim; j++)
6140  x[i] -= x[j] * decomposed[j * dim + i];
6141  }
6142  }
6143 
6144 
6152  public static void LdltSolve(IMatrix ldltMatrix, IMatrix B, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix X)
6153  {
6154  if (ldltMatrix == null)
6155  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
6156  int dim = ldltMatrix.RowCount;
6157  if (B == null)
6158  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
6159  if (B.RowCount != dim)
6160  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides does not have as many rows as there are equations.");
6161  int numSystems = B.ColumnCount;
6162  if (ldltMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
6163  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6164  if (auxX == null)
6165  auxX = ldltMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6166  if (auxX.Length != dim)
6167  auxX = ldltMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6168  if (X == null)
6169  X = ldltMatrix.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
6170  if (X.RowCount != dim || X.ColumnCount != numSystems)
6171  X = ldltMatrix.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
6172  if (object.ReferenceEquals(ldltMatrix, X) || object.ReferenceEquals(ldltMatrix, B) || object.ReferenceEquals(B, X))
6173  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place to such extent.");
6174  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < numSystems; ++whichSystem)
6175  {
6176  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
6177  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6178  auxX[j] = B[j, whichSystem];
6179  // Solve the system with this vector:
6180  LdltSolve(ldltMatrix, auxX, ref auxX);
6181  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6182  X[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
6183  }
6184  }
6185 
6192  public static void LdltInverse(IMatrix ldltMatrix, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix res)
6193  {
6194  if (ldltMatrix == null)
6195  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
6196  int dim = ldltMatrix.RowCount;
6197  if (ldltMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
6198  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6199  if (auxX == null)
6200  auxX = ldltMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6201  if (auxX.Length != dim)
6202  auxX = ldltMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6203  if (res == null)
6204  res = ldltMatrix.GetNew(dim, dim);
6205  if (res.RowCount != dim || res.ColumnCount != dim)
6206  res = ldltMatrix.GetNew(dim, dim);
6207  if (object.ReferenceEquals(ldltMatrix, res))
6208  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place to this extent.");
6209  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < dim; ++whichSystem)
6210  {
6211  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
6212  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6213  {
6214  // make right-hand vector contain a column of identity matrix:
6215  if (j != whichSystem)
6216  auxX[j] = 0.0;
6217  else
6218  auxX[j] = 1.0;
6219  }
6220  // Solve the system with this vector:
6221  LdltSolve(ldltMatrix, auxX, ref auxX);
6222  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6223  res[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
6224  }
6225  }
6226 
6227 
6228 
6233  public static double LdltDeterminant(IMatrix ldltMatrix)
6234  {
6235  if (ldltMatrix == null)
6236  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not specified.");
6237  int dim = ldltMatrix.RowCount;
6238  if (ldltMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
6239  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6240  double result = 1.0;
6241  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6242  result *= ldltMatrix[i, i];
6243  return result;
6244  }
6245 
6246 
6254  public static void LdltExtractLower(IMatrix matLdlt, ref IMatrix result)
6255  {
6256  if (matLdlt == null)
6257  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing LDLT decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
6258  int dim = matLdlt.RowCount;
6259  if (matLdlt.ColumnCount != dim)
6260  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6261  if (result == null)
6262  result = matLdlt.GetNew(dim, dim);
6263  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6264  result = matLdlt.GetNew(dim, dim);
6265  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matLdlt, result))
6266  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
6267  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6268  {
6269  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6270  {
6271  if (i == j)
6272  result[i, j] = 1.0;
6273  else if (i > j)
6274  result[i, j] = matLdlt[i, j];
6275  else
6276  result[i, j] = 0.0;
6277  }
6278  }
6279  }
6280 
6288  public static IMatrix LdltExtractUpper(IMatrix matLdlt, ref IMatrix result)
6289  {
6290  if (matLdlt == null)
6291  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing LDLT decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
6292  int dim = matLdlt.RowCount;
6293  if (matLdlt.ColumnCount != dim)
6294  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6295  if (result == null)
6296  result = matLdlt.GetNew(dim, dim);
6297  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6298  result = matLdlt.GetNew(dim, dim);
6299  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matLdlt, result))
6300  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
6301  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6302  {
6303  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6304  {
6305  if (i == j)
6306  result[i, j] = 1.0;
6307  else if (i < j)
6308  result[i, j] = matLdlt[j, i]; // take from lower part; with current implementation, upper part can also be used.
6309  else
6310  result[i, j] = 0.0;
6311  }
6312  }
6313  return result;
6314  }
6315 
6323  public static IMatrix LdltExtractDiagonal(IMatrix matLdlt, ref IMatrix result)
6324  {
6325  if (matLdlt == null)
6326  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing LDLT decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
6327  int dim = matLdlt.RowCount;
6328  if (matLdlt.ColumnCount != dim)
6329  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LDLT decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6330  if (result == null)
6331  result = matLdlt.GetNew(dim, dim);
6332  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6333  result = matLdlt.GetNew(dim, dim);
6334  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matLdlt, result))
6335  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
6336  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6337  {
6338  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6339  {
6340  if (i == j)
6341  result[i, j] = matLdlt[i, j];
6342  else
6343  result[i, j] = 0.0;
6344  }
6345  }
6346  return result;
6347  }
6348 
6349 
6350  #region LdltDecomposition.Tests
6351 
6352 
6371  public static bool TestLdltDecomposition(int dim, int numRepetitions = 1, double tol = 1e-6, int outputLevel = 0,
6372  IRandomGenerator randomGenerator = null, IMatrix A = null, IVector b = null)
6373  {
6374  bool passed = true;
6375  if (tol <= 0)
6376  tol = 1.0e-6;
6377  double smallNumber = 1e-20; // e.g. for guarding division by 0
6378  StopWatch1 t = new StopWatch1();
6379  try
6380  {
6381  double determinant = 0;
6382  if (randomGenerator == null)
6383  randomGenerator = RandomGenerator.Global;
6384  if (numRepetitions < 1)
6385  numRepetitions = 1;
6386  if (A != null)
6387  {
6388  dim = A.RowCount;
6389  if (!MatrixBase.IsSymmetric(A, tol))
6390  throw new ArgumentException("The specified matrix for testing LDLT decomposition is not symmetric.");
6391  determinant = DeterminantSlow(A);
6392  }
6393  else if (b != null)
6394  dim = b.Length;
6395  if (outputLevel >= 1)
6396  {
6397  if (numRepetitions < 2)
6398  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LDLT decomposition..." + Environment.NewLine);
6399  else
6400  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LDLT decomposition (" + numRepetitions + " repetitions)..."
6401  + Environment.NewLine);
6402  }
6403  for (int repetition = 0; repetition < numRepetitions; ++repetition)
6404  {
6405  if (numRepetitions > 1 && outputLevel >= 1)
6406  {
6407  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "REPETITION No. " + repetition + " of the LDLT decomposition test..." + Environment.NewLine);
6408  }
6409  t.Start();
6410  if (A == null || repetition > 1)
6411  {
6412  A = new Matrix(dim, dim);
6413  determinant = MatrixBase.SetRandomPositiveDefiniteSymmetric(A, randomGenerator);
6414  }
6415  if (b == null || repetition > 1)
6416  {
6417  b = new Vector(dim);
6418  VectorBase.SetRandom(b);
6419  }
6420  if (A.RowCount != dim || A.ColumnCount != dim || b.Length != dim)
6421  throw new ArgumentException("Provided matrix and/or right/hand sides are not of correct dimensions.");
6422  t.Stop();
6423  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6424  {
6425  Console.WriteLine("Preparation of test input done in " + t.Time + "s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime + ").");
6426  Console.WriteLine("Dimension of the matrix for LDLT testing decomposition: " + dim + "." + Environment.NewLine);
6427  }
6428  IMatrix LDLT = new Matrix(dim, dim);
6429  t.Start();
6430  LdltDecompose(A, ref LDLT);
6431  t.Stop();
6432  // Check the product:
6433  IMatrix product = null;
6434  IMatrix auxMat = null;
6435  IMatrix diffMat = null;
6436  IMatrix lower = null;
6437  IMatrix upper = null;
6438  IMatrix diagonal = null;
6439  LdltExtractLower(LDLT, ref lower);
6440  LdltExtractUpper(LDLT, ref upper);
6441  LdltExtractDiagonal(LDLT, ref diagonal);
6442  //MatrixBase.Multiply(lower, diagonal, upper, ref product);
6443  //Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Dedomposed matrices: \nLDLT: \n"
6444  // + LDLT.ToStringReadable() + "lower: \n" + lower.ToStringReadable() + "upper: \n" + upper.ToStringReadable()
6445  // + "diagonal: \n" + diagonal.ToStringReadable());
6446  MatrixBase.Multiply(lower, diagonal, ref auxMat);
6447  MatrixBase.Multiply(auxMat, upper, ref product);
6448  //Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Dedomposed matrices: \nLDLT: \n"
6449  // + LDLT.ToStringReadable() + "lower: \n" + lower.ToStringReadable() + "upper: \n" + upper.ToStringReadable()
6450  // + "diagonal: \n" + diagonal.ToStringReadable()
6451  // + "\nfirst product: \n" + auxMat.ToStringReadable() + "second product: \n" + product.ToStringReadable()
6452  // + "original: \n" + A.ToStringReadable());
6453  MatrixBase.Subtract(product, A, ref diffMat);
6454  // IMatrix restored = null;
6455  double relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (A.NormForbenius + smallNumber);
6456  if (relativeError > tol)
6457  passed = false;
6458  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6459  {
6460  Console.WriteLine("LDLT decompositin calculated in "
6461  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + "s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6462  if (relativeError > tol)
6463  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: product of lower and upperr does not match original, relative error = "
6464  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6465  Console.WriteLine("Product of factors: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6466  }
6467  // Check soution of system of equations:
6468  IVector x = null;
6469  IVector auxVec1 = null;
6470  t.Start();
6471  LdltSolve(LDLT, b, ref x);
6472  t.Stop();
6473  IVector testVec = null;
6474  IVector diffVec = null;
6475  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, x, ref testVec);
6476  VectorBase.Subtract(testVec, b, ref diffVec);
6477  relativeError = diffVec.Norm / (b.Norm + smallNumber);
6478  if (relativeError > tol)
6479  passed = false;
6480  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6481  {
6482  Console.WriteLine("Equations solved (just back substitution) in "
6483  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6484  if (relativeError > tol)
6485  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: soLDLTtion of system of equations not correct, relative error = "
6486  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6487  Console.WriteLine("Solution of system of equations: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6488  }
6489 
6490  // Check calculation of determinant:
6491  t.Start();
6492  double detCalc = LdltDeterminant(LDLT);
6493  t.Stop();
6494  relativeError = Math.Abs(detCalc - determinant) / (Math.Abs(determinant) + smallNumber);
6495  if (relativeError > tol)
6496  passed = false;
6497  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6498  {
6499  Console.WriteLine("Determinant caLDLTclated from decomposition in "
6500  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6501  if (relativeError > tol)
6502  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of determinant not correct, relative error = "
6503  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6504  Console.WriteLine("Calculation of determinant from decomposition: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6505  }
6506  // Check calculation of inverse matrix (directly):
6507  IMatrix inverseMat = null;
6508  t.Start();
6509  LdltInverse(LDLT, ref auxVec1, ref inverseMat);
6510  t.Stop();
6511  IMatrix identityMat = new Matrix(dim, dim); MatrixBase.SetIdentity(identityMat);
6512  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, inverseMat, ref product);
6513  Matrix.Subtract(product, identityMat, ref diffMat);
6514  relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (Math.Sqrt((double)dim));
6515  if (relativeError > tol)
6516  passed = false;
6517  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6518  {
6519  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse directly from decomposition in "
6520  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6521  if (relativeError > tol)
6522  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of matrix inverse not correct, relative error = "
6523  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6524  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse directly from decomposition: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6525  }
6526  // Check calculation of inverse matrix (through solutions of equations with identity right-hand side):
6527  MatrixBase.SetZero(inverseMat);
6528  t.Start();
6529  LdltSolve(LDLT, identityMat, ref auxVec1, ref inverseMat);
6530  t.Stop();
6531  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, inverseMat, ref product);
6532  Matrix.Subtract(product, identityMat, ref diffMat);
6533  relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (Math.Sqrt((double)dim));
6534  if (relativeError > tol)
6535  passed = false;
6536  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6537  {
6538  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse through equation solving in "
6539  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6540  if (relativeError > tol)
6541  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of matrix inverse through equation solving not correct, relative error = "
6542  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6543  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse through equation solving: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6544  }
6545  } // loop over repetitions
6546  }
6547  catch (Exception ex)
6548  {
6549  passed = false;
6550  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6551  {
6552  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: Exception throwin in the LDLT test." +
6553  Environment.NewLine + " Message: " + ex.Message);
6554  }
6555  }
6556  if (outputLevel >= 1)
6557  {
6558  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Total time spent for test operations: "
6559  + t.TotalTime.ToString("G4") + " s (CPU: " + t.TotalCpuTime.ToString("G4") + " s)." + Environment.NewLine);
6560  if (passed)
6561  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LDLT decomposition completed SUCCESSFULLY." + Environment.NewLine);
6562  else
6563  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of LDLT decomposition completed with ERRORS." + Environment.NewLine);
6564  }
6565  return passed;
6566  }
6567 
6568  #endregion LdltDecomposition.Tests
6569 
6570 
6571  #endregion LdltDecomposition
6572 
6573 
6574 
6575  #region CholeskyDecomposition
6576 
6577 
6586  public static bool CholeskyDecompose(IMatrix A, ref IMatrix result, double tol = 1e-12)
6587  {
6588  if (tol <= 0)
6589  tol = 1.0e-12;
6590  if (A == null)
6591  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be Cholesky decomposed is not specified (null reference).");
6592  int dim = A.RowCount;
6593  if (A.ColumnCount != dim)
6594  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be Cholesky decomposed is not a square matrix.");
6595  if (result == null)
6596  result = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
6597  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6598  result = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
6599 
6600  if (!object.ReferenceEquals(A, result))
6601  MatrixBase.CopyPlain(A, result);
6602 
6603  for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++)
6604  {
6605  // Working on the i-th column:
6606  // Determine the i-th diagonal element:
6607  double q = A[i, i];
6608  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++)
6609  {
6610  double el = result[i, j];
6611  q -= el * el;
6612  }
6613  if (q < tol)
6614  throw new InvalidOperationException("Matrix whose Cholesky decomposition is calculated is singular.");
6615  q = Math.Sqrt(q);
6616  result[i, i] = q;
6617  // Determine lower entries:
6618  for (int j = i + 1; j < dim; j++)
6619  {
6620  double p = A[j, i];
6621  for (int k = 0; k < i; k++)
6622  {
6623  p -= result[i, k] * result[j, k];
6624  }
6625  double el = p / q;
6626  result[j, i] = el;
6627  result[i, j] = el;
6628  }
6629  }
6630 
6631  return true;
6632  }
6633 
6642  public static void CholeskySolve(IMatrix decomposed, IVector b, ref IVector x)
6643  {
6644  if (decomposed == null)
6645  throw new ArgumentException("Cholesky decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
6646  int dim = decomposed.RowCount;
6647  if (decomposed.ColumnCount != dim)
6648  throw new ArgumentException("Decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
6649  if (b == null)
6650  throw new ArgumentException("Vector of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
6651  if (b.Length != dim)
6652  throw new ArgumentException("Vector of right-hand sides is of inconsistent dimentions.");
6653  if (x == null)
6654  x = b.GetNew(dim);
6655  else if (x.Length != dim)
6656  x = b.GetNew(dim);
6657  if (!object.ReferenceEquals(x, b))
6658  VectorBase.Copy(b, x);
6659 
6660 
6661  // Determine Ly = b
6662  IVector y = decomposed.GetNewVector(dim);
6663  for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++)
6664  {
6665  y[i] = b[i];
6666  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++)
6667  {
6668  y[i] -= decomposed[j, i] * y[j];
6669  }
6670  y[i] = y[i] / decomposed[i, i];
6671  }
6672 
6673  // Determine L^T x = y
6674  // double[] z = new double[dim];
6675 
6676  // Re-use y for z, since we don't need a value after it's set
6677  for (int i = (dim - 1); i >= 0; i--)
6678  {
6679  x[i] = y[i];
6680  for (int j = (dim - 1); j > i; j--)
6681  {
6682  x[i] -= decomposed[i, j] * x[j];
6683  }
6684  x[i] = x[i] / decomposed[i, i];
6685  }
6686 
6687 
6688 
6689  }
6690 
6698  public static void CholeskySolve(IMatrix CholeskyMatrix, IMatrix B, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix X)
6699  {
6700  if (CholeskyMatrix == null)
6701  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
6702  int dim = CholeskyMatrix.RowCount;
6703  if (B == null)
6704  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
6705  if (B.RowCount != dim)
6706  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides does not have as many rows as there are equations.");
6707  int numSystems = B.ColumnCount;
6708  if (CholeskyMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
6709  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing LU decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6710  if (auxX == null)
6711  auxX = CholeskyMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6712  if (auxX.Length != dim)
6713  auxX = CholeskyMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6714  if (X == null)
6715  X = CholeskyMatrix.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
6716  if (X.RowCount != dim || X.ColumnCount != numSystems)
6717  X = CholeskyMatrix.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
6718  if (object.ReferenceEquals(CholeskyMatrix, X) || object.ReferenceEquals(CholeskyMatrix, B) || object.ReferenceEquals(B, X))
6719  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place to such extent.");
6720  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < numSystems; ++whichSystem)
6721  {
6722  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
6723  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6724  auxX[j] = B[j, whichSystem];
6725  // Solve the system with this vector:
6726  CholeskySolve(CholeskyMatrix, auxX, ref auxX);
6727  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6728  X[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
6729  }
6730  }
6731 
6738  public static void CholeskyInverse(IMatrix CholeskyMatrix, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix res)
6739  {
6740  if (CholeskyMatrix == null)
6741  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not specified (null reference).");
6742  int dim = CholeskyMatrix.RowCount;
6743  if (CholeskyMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
6744  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6745  if (auxX == null)
6746  auxX = CholeskyMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6747  if (auxX.Length != dim)
6748  auxX = CholeskyMatrix.GetNewVector(dim);
6749  if (res == null)
6750  res = CholeskyMatrix.GetNew(dim, dim);
6751  if (res.RowCount != dim || res.ColumnCount != dim)
6752  res = CholeskyMatrix.GetNew(dim, dim);
6753  if (object.ReferenceEquals(CholeskyMatrix, res))
6754  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place to this extent.");
6755  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < dim; ++whichSystem)
6756  {
6757  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
6758  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6759  {
6760  // make right-hand vector contain a column of identity matrix:
6761  if (j != whichSystem)
6762  auxX[j] = 0.0;
6763  else
6764  auxX[j] = 1.0;
6765  }
6766  // Solve the system with this vector:
6767  CholeskySolve(CholeskyMatrix, auxX, ref auxX);
6768  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6769  res[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
6770  }
6771  }
6772 
6777  public static double CholeskyDeterminant(IMatrix CholeskyMatrix)
6778  {
6779  if (CholeskyMatrix == null)
6780  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not specified.");
6781  int dim = CholeskyMatrix.RowCount;
6782  if (CholeskyMatrix.ColumnCount != dim)
6783  throw new ArgumentException("Determinant calculation: Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6784  double result = 1.0;
6785  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6786  result *= CholeskyMatrix[i, i];
6787  result *= result; // there are two factors with the same diagonal
6788  return result;
6789  }
6790 
6798  public static void CholeskyExtractLower(IMatrix matCholesky, ref IMatrix result)
6799  {
6800  if (matCholesky == null)
6801  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing Cholesky decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
6802  int dim = matCholesky.RowCount;
6803  if (matCholesky.ColumnCount != dim)
6804  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6805  if (result == null)
6806  result = matCholesky.GetNew(dim, dim);
6807  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6808  result = matCholesky.GetNew(dim, dim);
6809  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matCholesky, result))
6810  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
6811  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6812  {
6813  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6814  {
6815  if (i >= j)
6816  result[i, j] = matCholesky[i, j];
6817  else
6818  result[i, j] = 0.0;
6819  }
6820  }
6821  }
6822 
6830  public static IMatrix CholeskyExtractUpper(IMatrix matCholesky, ref IMatrix result)
6831  {
6832  if (matCholesky == null)
6833  throw new ArgumentException("Marix containing Cholesky decomposed original is not specified (null reference).");
6834  int dim = matCholesky.RowCount;
6835  if (matCholesky.ColumnCount != dim)
6836  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix containing Cholesky decomposition is not a square matrix.");
6837  if (result == null)
6838  result = matCholesky.GetNew(dim, dim);
6839  if (result.RowCount != dim || result.ColumnCount != dim)
6840  result = matCholesky.GetNew(dim, dim);
6841  if (object.ReferenceEquals(matCholesky, result))
6842  throw new ArgumentException("Input and result matrix are the same, which is not allowed.");
6843  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
6844  {
6845  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
6846  {
6847  if (i <= j)
6848  result[i, j] = matCholesky[j, i]; // take from lower part; with current implementation, upper part can also be used.
6849  else
6850  result[i, j] = 0.0;
6851  }
6852  }
6853  return result;
6854  }
6855 
6856 
6857  #region CholeskyDecomposition.Tests
6858 
6859 
6878  public static bool TestCholeskyDecomposition(int dim, int numRepetitions = 1, double tol = 1e-6, int outputLevel = 0,
6879  IRandomGenerator randomGenerator = null, IMatrix A = null, IVector b = null)
6880  {
6881  bool passed = true;
6882  if (tol <= 0)
6883  tol = 1.0e-6;
6884  double smallNumber = 1e-20; // e.g. for guarding division by 0
6885  StopWatch1 t = new StopWatch1();
6886  try
6887  {
6888  double determinant = 0;
6889  if (randomGenerator == null)
6890  randomGenerator = RandomGenerator.Global;
6891  if (numRepetitions < 1)
6892  numRepetitions = 1;
6893  if (A != null)
6894  {
6895  dim = A.RowCount;
6896  if (!MatrixBase.IsSymmetric(A, tol))
6897  throw new ArgumentException("The specified matrix for testing Cholesky decomposition is not symmetric.");
6898  determinant = DeterminantSlow(A);
6899  }
6900  else if (b != null)
6901  dim = b.Length;
6902  if (outputLevel >= 1)
6903  {
6904  if (numRepetitions < 2)
6905  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of Cholesky decomposition..." + Environment.NewLine);
6906  else
6907  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of Cholesky decomposition (" + numRepetitions + " repetitions)..."
6908  + Environment.NewLine);
6909  }
6910  for (int repetition = 0; repetition < numRepetitions; ++repetition)
6911  {
6912  if (numRepetitions > 1 && outputLevel >= 1)
6913  {
6914  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "REPETITION No. " + repetition + " of the Cholesky decomposition test..." + Environment.NewLine);
6915  }
6916  t.Start();
6917  if (A == null || repetition > 1)
6918  {
6919  A = new Matrix(dim, dim);
6920  determinant = MatrixBase.SetRandomPositiveDefiniteSymmetric(A, randomGenerator);
6921  }
6922  if (b == null || repetition > 1)
6923  {
6924  b = new Vector(dim);
6925  VectorBase.SetRandom(b);
6926  }
6927  if (A.RowCount != dim || A.ColumnCount != dim || b.Length != dim)
6928  throw new ArgumentException("Provided matrix and/or right/hand sides are not of correct dimensions.");
6929  t.Stop();
6930  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6931  {
6932  Console.WriteLine("Preparation of test input done in " + t.Time + "s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime + ").");
6933  Console.WriteLine("Dimension of the matrix for Cholesky testing decomposition: " + dim + "." + Environment.NewLine);
6934  }
6935  IMatrix Cholesky = new Matrix(dim, dim);
6936  t.Start();
6937  CholeskyDecompose(A, ref Cholesky);
6938  t.Stop();
6939  // Check the product:
6940  IMatrix product = null;
6941  IMatrix diffMat = null;
6942  IMatrix lower = null;
6943  IMatrix upper = null;
6944  CholeskyExtractLower(Cholesky, ref lower);
6945  CholeskyExtractUpper(Cholesky, ref upper);
6946  MatrixBase.Multiply(lower, upper, ref product);
6947  //Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Dedomposed matrices: \nCholesky: \n"
6948  // + Cholesky.ToStringReadable() + "lower: \n" + lower.ToStringReadable() + "upper: \n" + upper.ToStringReadable());
6949  //Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Dedomposed matrices: \nCholesky: \n"
6950  // + Cholesky.ToStringReadable() + "lower: \n" + lower.ToStringReadable() + "upper: \n" + upper.ToStringReadable()
6951  // + "product: \n" + product.ToStringReadable()
6952  // + "original: \n" + A.ToStringReadable());
6953  MatrixBase.Subtract(product, A, ref diffMat);
6954  // IMatrix restored = null;
6955  double relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (A.NormForbenius + smallNumber);
6956  if (relativeError > tol)
6957  passed = false;
6958  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6959  {
6960  Console.WriteLine("Cholesky decompositin calculated in "
6961  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + "s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6962  if (relativeError > tol)
6963  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: product of lower and upperr does not match original, relative error = "
6964  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6965  Console.WriteLine("Product of factors: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6966  }
6967  // Check soution of system of equations:
6968  IVector x = null;
6969  IVector auxVec1 = null;
6970  t.Start();
6971  CholeskySolve(Cholesky, b, ref x);
6972  t.Stop();
6973  IVector testVec = null;
6974  IVector diffVec = null;
6975  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, x, ref testVec);
6976  VectorBase.Subtract(testVec, b, ref diffVec);
6977  relativeError = diffVec.Norm / (b.Norm + smallNumber);
6978  if (relativeError > tol)
6979  passed = false;
6980  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6981  {
6982  Console.WriteLine("Equations solved (just back substitution) in "
6983  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6984  if (relativeError > tol)
6985  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: soCholeskytion of system of equations not correct, relative error = "
6986  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
6987  Console.WriteLine("Solution of system of equations: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
6988  }
6989 
6990  // Check calculation of determinant:
6991  t.Start();
6992  double detCalc = CholeskyDeterminant(Cholesky);
6993  t.Stop();
6994  relativeError = Math.Abs(detCalc - determinant) / (Math.Abs(determinant) + smallNumber);
6995  if (outputLevel >= 0)
6996  {
6997  Console.WriteLine("Determinant caCholeskyclated from decomposition in "
6998  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
6999  if (relativeError > tol)
7000  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of determinant not correct, relative error = "
7001  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
7002  Console.WriteLine("Calculation of determinant from decomposition: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
7003  }
7004  // Check calculation of inverse matrix (directly):
7005  IMatrix inverseMat = null;
7006  t.Start();
7007  CholeskyInverse(Cholesky, ref auxVec1, ref inverseMat);
7008  t.Stop();
7009  IMatrix identityMat = new Matrix(dim, dim); MatrixBase.SetIdentity(identityMat);
7010  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, inverseMat, ref product);
7011  Matrix.Subtract(product, identityMat, ref diffMat);
7012  relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (Math.Sqrt((double)dim));
7013  if (relativeError > tol)
7014  passed = false;
7015  if (outputLevel >= 0)
7016  {
7017  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse directly from decomposition in "
7018  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
7019  if (relativeError > tol)
7020  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of matrix inverse not correct, relative error = "
7021  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
7022  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse directly from decomposition: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
7023  }
7024  // Check calculation of inverse matrix (through solutions of equations with identity right-hand side):
7025  MatrixBase.SetZero(inverseMat);
7026  t.Start();
7027  CholeskySolve(Cholesky, identityMat, ref auxVec1, ref inverseMat);
7028  t.Stop();
7029  MatrixBase.Multiply(A, inverseMat, ref product);
7030  Matrix.Subtract(product, identityMat, ref diffMat);
7031  relativeError = diffMat.NormForbenius / (Math.Sqrt((double)dim));
7032  if (relativeError > tol)
7033  passed = false;
7034  if (outputLevel >= 0)
7035  {
7036  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse through equation solving in "
7037  + t.Time.ToString("G2") + " s (CPU: " + t.CpuTime.ToString("G2") + " s).");
7038  if (relativeError > tol)
7039  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: calculation of matrix inverse through equation solving not correct, relative error = "
7040  + relativeError + Environment.NewLine);
7041  Console.WriteLine("Matrix inverse through equation solving: relative error = " + relativeError.ToString("G2"));
7042  }
7043  } // loop over repetitions
7044  }
7045  catch (Exception ex)
7046  {
7047  passed = false;
7048  if (outputLevel >= 0)
7049  {
7050  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "ERROR: Exception throwin in the Cholesky test." +
7051  Environment.NewLine + " Message: " + ex.Message);
7052  }
7053  }
7054  if (outputLevel >= 1)
7055  {
7056  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Total time spent for test operations: "
7057  + t.TotalTime.ToString("G4") + " s (CPU: " + t.TotalCpuTime.ToString("G4") + " s)." + Environment.NewLine);
7058  if (passed)
7059  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of Cholesky decomposition completed SUCCESSFULLY." + Environment.NewLine);
7060  else
7061  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of Cholesky decomposition completed with ERRORS." + Environment.NewLine);
7062  }
7063  return passed;
7064  }
7065 
7066 
7067 
7070  public static void TestCholeskyDecompositionDemo()
7071  {
7072  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Begin Cholesky decomposition demo." + Environment.NewLine);
7073 
7074  int dim = 3;
7075  IMatrix m = new Matrix(dim, dim);
7076  m[0, 0] = 4; m[0, 1] = 12; m[0, 2] = -16;
7077  m[1, 0] = 12; m[1, 1] = 37; m[1, 2] = -43;
7078  m[2, 0] = -16; m[2, 1] = -43; m[2, 2] = 98;
7079 
7080  Console.WriteLine("System matrix = " + Environment.NewLine + m.ToStringReadable());
7081 
7082  int[] perm = new int[dim];
7083  IMatrix CholeskyMatrix = m.GetNew(dim, dim);
7084  CholeskyDecompose(m, ref CholeskyMatrix);
7085 
7086  IMatrix lower = null;
7087  IMatrix upper = null;
7088 
7089  CholeskyExtractLower(CholeskyMatrix, ref lower);
7090  CholeskyExtractUpper(CholeskyMatrix, ref upper);
7091 
7092  Console.WriteLine("The (combined) Cholesky decomposition of m is" + Environment.NewLine + CholeskyMatrix.ToStringReadable());
7093  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "The lower part of Cholesky is " + Environment.NewLine + lower.ToStringReadable());
7094  Console.WriteLine("The upper part of Cholesky is " + Environment.NewLine + upper.ToStringReadable());
7095 
7096  IVector auxX = null;
7097 
7098  // Calculation of inverse:
7099  IMatrix inverse = null;
7100  CholeskyInverse(CholeskyMatrix, ref auxX, ref inverse);
7101  Console.WriteLine("Inverse of m computed from its decomposition is " + Environment.NewLine + inverse.ToStringReadable());
7102  IMatrix prod = m.GetNew();
7103  MatrixBase.Multiply(inverse, m, ref prod);
7104  // Console.WriteLine("Product of matrix and its inverse is\n" + MatrixAsString(prod));
7105  // Test inverse correctness:
7106  IMatrix diff = m.GetNew();
7107  MatrixBase.SetIdentity(diff);
7108  MatrixBase.Subtract(prod, diff, ref diff);
7109  Console.WriteLine("Error norm for matrix inverse: " + (diff.NormForbenius).ToString() + Environment.NewLine);
7110 
7111  // Calculate inverse in another way - by solbving multiple systems of equations with right-hand
7112  // sides defined by identity matrix:
7113 
7114  inverse = null;
7115  IMatrix B = m.GetNew(dim, dim);
7116  MatrixBase.SetIdentity(B);
7117  CholeskySolve(CholeskyMatrix, B, ref auxX, ref inverse);
7118  Console.WriteLine("Inverse of m computed by explicit equation solving (identity right-hand) is " + Environment.NewLine + inverse.ToStringReadable());
7119  prod = null;
7120  MatrixBase.Multiply(inverse, m, ref prod);
7121  // Test inverse correctness:
7122  MatrixBase.SetIdentity(diff);
7123  MatrixBase.Subtract(prod, diff, ref diff);
7124  Console.WriteLine("Inverse by solving with matrix right-hand sides, error norm: " + (diff.NormForbenius).ToString() + Environment.NewLine);
7125 
7126  double det = CholeskyDeterminant(CholeskyMatrix);
7127  Console.WriteLine("Determinant of m computed via decomposition = " + det.ToString("F1"));
7128 
7129  double[] bArray = new double[] { 49.0, 30.0, 43.0 };
7130 
7131  IVector b = new Vector(bArray);
7132  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Right-hand side vector: " + b.ToStringMath());
7133 
7134  Console.WriteLine("Solving system via decomposition...");
7135  IVector x = null;
7136  CholeskySolve(CholeskyMatrix, b, ref x);
7137 
7138  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Solution is x = " + x.ToStringMath());
7139 
7140  // Insight in matrix decomposition concepts:
7141  IMatrix Cholesky = null;
7142  Multiply(lower, upper, ref Cholesky);
7143  IMatrix orig = null;
7144  int[] auxArray = null;
7145  UnPermute(Cholesky, perm, ref auxArray, ref orig); // use a custom method with the perm array to unscramble Cholesky
7146  MatrixBase.Subtract(orig, m, ref diff);
7147  if (diff.NormForbenius < 0.000000001)
7148  Console.WriteLine("\nProduct of L and U successfully unpermuted using perm array.");
7149  else
7150  Console.WriteLine("\nPruduct of L and U unpermuted UNSUCCESSFULLY using perm array.");
7151 
7152  IMatrix permMatrix = m.GetNew(dim, dim);
7153  PermutationArrayToMatrix(perm, ref permMatrix); // convert the perm array to a matrix
7154  MatrixBase.Multiply(permMatrix, Cholesky, ref orig); // another way to unscramble
7155  MatrixBase.Subtract(orig, m, ref diff);
7156  if (diff.NormForbenius < 0.000000001)
7157  Console.WriteLine("\nProduct of L and U successfully unpermuted using perm matrix.");
7158  else
7159  Console.WriteLine("\nPruduct of L and U unpermuted UNSUCCESSFULLY using permutation matrix.");
7160 
7161  Console.WriteLine("\nEnd of matrix decomposition demo.\n");
7162  // Console.ReadLine();
7163  } // TestCholeskyDecompositionDemo()
7164 
7165 
7166 
7167 
7168  #endregion CholeskyDecomposition.Tests
7169 
7170 
7171  #endregion CholeskyDecomposition
7172 
7173 
7174  #region QrDecompositon
7175 
7176 
7188  public static bool QrDecomposeGrammSchmidt(IMatrix A, ref IMatrix resQ, ref IMatrix resR, double tol = 1e-12)
7189  {
7190  if (tol <= 0)
7191  tol = 1.0e-12;
7192  if (A == null)
7193  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be QR decomposed is not specified (null reference).");
7194  int dim = A.RowCount;
7195  if (A.ColumnCount != dim)
7196  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix to be QR decomposed is not a square matrix.");
7197  if (resQ == null)
7198  resQ = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
7199  if (resQ.RowCount != dim || resQ.ColumnCount != dim)
7200  resQ = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
7201  if (resR == null)
7202  resR = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
7203  if (resR.RowCount != dim || resR.ColumnCount != dim)
7204  resR = A.GetNew(dim, dim);
7205 
7206  for (int whichCol = 0; whichCol < dim; ++ whichCol)
7207  {
7208  // Copy column from A to Q:
7209  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++ i)
7210  resQ[i, whichCol] = A[i, whichCol];
7211  for (int whichBasis = 0; whichBasis < whichCol; ++ whichBasis)
7212  {
7213  double dotProd = 0;
7214  // Calculate inner product between orthonormed vector No. whichProj and the current column vector:
7215  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
7216  dotProd += resQ [i, whichBasis] * resQ[i, whichCol];
7217  // from the current column vector, subtract its projection on the orthonormed vector:
7218  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
7219  {
7220  resQ[i, whichCol] -= dotProd * resQ[i, whichBasis];
7221  }
7222  }
7223  // Finally, normalize the newly calculated column of Q:
7224  double norm = 0.0;
7225  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++ i)
7226  {
7227  double el = resQ[i, whichCol];
7228  norm += el * el;
7229  }
7230  norm = Math.Sqrt(norm);
7231  if (norm < tol)
7232  throw new InvalidOperationException("Orthogonalization failed in QR decomposition, rank deficiency (tolerance: " + tol + ").");
7233  double normReciprocal = 1.0 / norm;
7234  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
7235  {
7236  resQ[i, whichCol] *= normReciprocal;
7237  }
7238  // Now that we have Q, calculate R:
7239  for (int row = 0; row < dim; ++row)
7240  {
7241  for (int col = 0; col < dim; ++col)
7242  {
7243  if (row > col)
7244  resR[row, col] = 0;
7245  else
7246  {
7247  double dotProd = 0;
7248  for (int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
7249  {
7250  dotProd += resQ[i, row] * A[i, col];
7251  }
7252  resR[row, col] = dotProd;
7253  }
7254  }
7255  }
7256 
7257  }
7258 
7259 
7260  return true;
7261  }
7262 
7263 
7275  public static bool QrDecompose(IMatrix A, ref IMatrix resQ, ref IMatrix resR, double tol = 1e-12)
7276  {
7277  return QrDecomposeGrammSchmidt(A, ref resQ, ref resR, tol);
7278  }
7279 
7280 
7289  public static void QrSolve(IMatrix factorQ, IMatrix factorR, IVector b, ref IVector x)
7290  {
7291  if (factorQ == null)
7292  throw new ArgumentException("Factor Q of the QR decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
7293  int dim = factorQ.RowCount;
7294  if (factorQ.ColumnCount != dim)
7295  throw new ArgumentException("Factor Q of the QR decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
7296  if (factorR == null)
7297  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
7298  if (factorR.RowCount != dim)
7299  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix has wrong number of rows, "
7300  + factorR.RowCount + " instead of " + dim + ".");
7301  if (factorR.ColumnCount != dim)
7302  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
7303  if (b == null)
7304  throw new ArgumentException("Vector of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
7305  if (b.Length != dim)
7306  throw new ArgumentException("Vector of right-hand sides is of inconsistent dimentions, " + b.Length + " instead of " + dim + ".");
7307  if (x == null)
7308  x = b.GetNew(dim);
7309  else if (x.Length != dim)
7310  x = b.GetNew(dim);
7311  if (object.ReferenceEquals(b, x))
7312  throw new ArgumentException("Vectors of right-hand sides and solution are the same (reference equality), QR solve can not be done in place.");
7313 
7314  IVector auxVec = x;
7315 
7316  //if (auxVec == null)
7317  // auxVec = b.GetNew(dim);
7318  //else if (auxVec.Length != dim)
7319  // auxVec = b.GetNew(dim);
7320  //if (object.ReferenceEquals(b, auxVec))
7321  // throw new ArgumentException("The auxiliary vector and vector of right-hand sides are the same vectors (reference equality).");
7322 
7323  // Multiply by Q transposed form the left to obtain a new equation with system
7324  // matrix R and new rightphand sides auxVec:
7325  MatrixBase.MultiplyTranspVecPlain(factorQ, b, auxVec);
7326 
7327  // Solve the upper triangular system with system matrix R and right-hand sides auxVec:
7328  for (int row = dim - 1; row >= 0; --row)
7329  {
7330  double xx = auxVec[row];
7331  for (int col = row + 1; col < dim; ++ col)
7332  {
7333  xx -= factorR[row, col] * x[col];
7334  }
7335  xx /= factorR[row, row];
7336  x[row] = xx;
7337  }
7338 
7339  }
7340 
7341 
7352  public static void QrSolve(IMatrix factorQ, IMatrix factorR, IMatrix B, ref IVector auxB, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix X)
7353  {
7354  if (factorQ == null)
7355  throw new ArgumentException("Factor Q of the QR decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
7356  int dim = factorQ.RowCount;
7357  if (factorQ.ColumnCount != dim)
7358  throw new ArgumentException("Factor Q of the QR decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
7359  if (factorR == null)
7360  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
7361  if (factorR.RowCount != dim)
7362  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix has wrong number of rows, "
7363  + factorR.RowCount + " instead of " + dim + ".");
7364  if (factorR.ColumnCount != dim)
7365  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
7366  if (B == null)
7367  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides is not specified (null reference).");
7368  if (B.RowCount != dim)
7369  throw new ArgumentException("Matrix of right-hand sides does not have as many rows as there are equations.");
7370  int numSystems = B.ColumnCount;
7371  if (auxB == null)
7372  auxB = factorQ.GetNewVector(dim);
7373  if (auxB.Length != dim)
7374  auxB = factorQ.GetNewVector(dim);
7375  if (X == null)
7376  X = factorQ.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
7377  if (X.RowCount != dim || X.ColumnCount != numSystems)
7378  X = factorQ.GetNew(dim, numSystems);
7379  if (object.ReferenceEquals(factorQ, X) || object.ReferenceEquals(factorQ, B) || object.ReferenceEquals(B, X)
7380  || object.ReferenceEquals (factorR, X) || object.ReferenceEquals(factorR, B))
7381  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place to such extent.");
7382  if (object.ReferenceEquals(auxB, auxX))
7383  throw new ArgumentException("Auxiliary vectors for single right-hand sides and solutions are the same (reference equality).");
7384  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < numSystems; ++whichSystem)
7385  {
7386  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
7387  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
7388  auxB[j] = B[j, whichSystem];
7389  // Solve the system with this vector:
7390  QrSolve(factorQ, factorR, auxB, ref auxX);
7391  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
7392  X[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
7393  }
7394  }
7395 
7404  public static void QrInverse(IMatrix factorQ, IMatrix factorR, ref IVector auxB, ref IVector auxX, ref IMatrix res)
7405  {
7406  if (factorQ == null)
7407  throw new ArgumentException("Factor Q of the QR decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
7408  int dim = factorQ.RowCount;
7409  if (factorQ.ColumnCount != dim)
7410  throw new ArgumentException("Factor Q of the QR decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
7411  if (factorR == null)
7412  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix not specified (null reference).");
7413  if (factorR.RowCount != dim)
7414  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix has wrong number of rows, "
7415  + factorR.RowCount + " instead of " + dim + ".");
7416  if (factorR.ColumnCount != dim)
7417  throw new ArgumentException("Factor R of the QR decomposed matrix is not a square matrix.");
7418  if (auxB == null)
7419  auxB = factorQ.GetNewVector(dim);
7420  if (auxB.Length != dim)
7421  auxB = factorQ.GetNewVector(dim);
7422  if (auxX == null)
7423  auxX = factorQ.GetNewVector(dim);
7424  if (auxX.Length != dim)
7425  auxX = factorQ.GetNewVector(dim);
7426  if (res == null)
7427  res = factorQ.GetNew(dim, dim);
7428  if (res.RowCount != dim || res.ColumnCount != dim)
7429  res = factorQ.GetNew(dim, dim);
7430  if (object.ReferenceEquals(factorQ, res) || object.ReferenceEquals(factorR, res) )
7431  throw new ArgumentException("Input matrix the same as result matrix. Can not be done in place to such extent.");
7432  if (object.ReferenceEquals(auxB, auxX))
7433  throw new ArgumentException("Auxiliary vectors for single right-hand sides and solutions are the same (reference equality).");
7434 
7435  for (int whichSystem = 0; whichSystem < dim; ++whichSystem)
7436  {
7437  // Get column of B as right-hand sides:
7438  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
7439  {
7440  // make right-hand vector contain a column of identity matrix:
7441  if (j != whichSystem)
7442  auxB[j] = 0.0;
7443  else
7444  auxB[j] = 1.0;
7445  }
7446  // Solve the system with this vector:
7447  QrSolve(factorQ, factorR, auxB, ref auxX);
7448  for (int j = 0; j < dim; ++j)
7449  res[j, whichSystem] = auxX[j];
7450  }
7451  }
7452 
7453 
7454 
7455  #endregion QrDecomposition
7456 
7457  #region Testing
7458 
7459 
7469  protected static bool CheckTestResult(IMatrix result, IMatrix referenceResult, double tolerance, bool printReports)
7470  {
7471  if (tolerance<=0)
7472  throw new ArgumentException("Invalid tolerance " + tolerance + ", should not be less or equal to 0!");
7473  IMatrix diff = null;
7474  Subtract(result, referenceResult, ref diff);
7475  double normDiff = diff.NormForbenius;
7476  bool passed = true;
7477  if (normDiff <= tolerance)
7478  {
7479  if (printReports)
7480  Console.WriteLine("Test PASSED. Norm of difference: " + normDiff);
7481  } else
7482  {
7483  passed = false;
7484  if (printReports)
7485  {
7486  Console.WriteLine("ERROR: Test NOT passed. Norm of difference: " + normDiff + ", tolerance: " + tolerance);
7487  Console.WriteLine("Difference between the result of operation and reference result: ");
7488  Console.WriteLine(diff.ToString());
7489  }
7490  }
7491  return passed;
7492  }
7493 
7503  protected static bool CheckTestResult(IVector result, IVector referenceResult, double tolerance, bool printReports)
7504  {
7505  if (tolerance <= 0)
7506  throw new ArgumentException("Invalid tolerance " + tolerance + ", should not be less or equal to 0!");
7507  IVector diff = null;
7508  Vector.Subtract(result, referenceResult, ref diff);
7509  double normDiff = diff.Norm2;
7510  bool passed = true;
7511  if (normDiff <= tolerance)
7512  {
7513  if (printReports)
7514  Console.WriteLine("Test PASSED. Norm of difference: " + normDiff);
7515  }
7516  else
7517  {
7518  passed = false;
7519  if (printReports)
7520  {
7521  Console.WriteLine("ERROR: Test NOT passed. Norm of difference: " + normDiff + ", tolerance: " + tolerance);
7522  Console.WriteLine("Difference between the result of operation and reference result: ");
7523  Console.WriteLine(diff.ToString());
7524  }
7525  }
7526  return passed;
7527  }
7528 
7529 
7530 
7534  public static bool TestMatrixProducts(bool printReports)
7535  {
7536  return TestMatrixProducts(1.0e-6, printReports);
7537  }
7538 
7543  public static bool TestMatrixProducts(double tolerance)
7544  {
7545  return TestMatrixProducts(tolerance, false);
7546  }
7547 
7550  public static bool TestMatrixProducts()
7551  {
7552  return TestMatrixProducts(1.0e-6, false);
7553  }
7554 
7560  public static bool TestMatrixProducts(double tolerance, bool printReports)
7561  {
7562  if (tolerance <= 0)
7563  throw new ArgumentException("Invalid tolerance " + tolerance + ", should not be less or equal to 0!");
7564  bool passed = true, passedThis;
7565  int numPassed = 0, numFailed = 0;
7566  if (printReports)
7567  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine, "Tests of matrix products:");
7568 
7569  if (printReports)
7570  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyTranspMat: ");
7571  passedThis = TestMultiplyTranspMat(tolerance, printReports);
7572  passed = passed && passedThis;
7573  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7574 
7575  if (printReports)
7576  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyMatTransp: ");
7577  passedThis = TestMultiplyMatTransp(tolerance, printReports);
7578  passed = passed && passedThis;
7579  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7580 
7581  if (printReports)
7582  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyTranspTransp: ");
7583  passedThis = TestMultiplyTranspTransp(tolerance, printReports);
7584  passed = passed && passedThis;
7585  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7586 
7587  if (printReports)
7588  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Multiply3: ");
7589  passedThis = TestMultiply3(tolerance, printReports);
7590  passed = passed && passedThis;
7591  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7592 
7593  if (printReports)
7594  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyTranspMatTransp: ");
7595  passedThis = TestMultiplyTranspMatTransp(tolerance, printReports);
7596  passed = passed && passedThis;
7597  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7598 
7599  if (printReports)
7600  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyTranspMatMat: ");
7601  passedThis = TestMultiplyTranspMatMat(tolerance, printReports);
7602  passed = passed && passedThis;
7603  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7604 
7605  if (printReports)
7606  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyMatMatTransp: ");
7607  passedThis = TestMultiplyMatMatTransp(tolerance, printReports);
7608  passed = passed && passedThis;
7609  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7610 
7611  if (printReports)
7612  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyMatTranspMat: ");
7613  passedThis = TestMultiplyMatTranspMat(tolerance, printReports);
7614  passed = passed && passedThis;
7615  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7616 
7617  if (printReports)
7618  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "MultiplyTranspTranspTransp: ");
7619  passedThis = TestMultiplyTranspTranspTransp(tolerance, printReports);
7620  passed = passed && passedThis;
7621  if (passedThis) ++numPassed; else ++numFailed;
7622 
7623  if (printReports)
7624  {
7625  if (passed)
7626  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "All tests have passed." + Environment.NewLine);
7627  else
7628  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "WARNING: Some tests have NOT PASSED ("
7629  + numFailed + " of " + (numPassed + numFailed) + " failed)." + Environment.NewLine);
7630  }
7631  return passed;
7632  }
7633 
7634 
7636  public static void TestStaticMethodCommon()
7637  {
7638  Console.WriteLine("TestStaticMethodCommon from the MatrixBase class.");
7639  TestStaticMethodSpecific();
7640  }
7641 
7643  public static void TestStaticMethodSpecific()
7644  {
7645  Console.WriteLine("TestStaticMethod from MatrixBase.");
7646  }
7647 
7654  public static bool TestIndices(int dim1 = 3, int dim2 = 4, IMatrix providedMatrix = null)
7655  {
7656  Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Test of matrix index conversions ...");
7657  bool ret = true;
7658  IMatrix mat = null;
7659  if (providedMatrix == null)
7660  mat = new Matrix(dim1, dim2);
7661  else
7662  mat = providedMatrix;
7663  MatrixBase.SetRandom(mat);
7664  int iFlat = 0;
7665  for (int row = 0; row < mat.RowCount; ++row)
7666  for (int col = 0; col < mat.ColumnCount; ++col)
7667  {
7668  double element = mat[row, col];
7669  int flatIndex = MatrixBase.Index(mat, row, col);
7670  double elementFlat = mat[flatIndex];
7671  int rowCalc, colCalc;
7672  MatrixBase.Indices(mat, flatIndex, out rowCalc, out colCalc);
7673  Console.WriteLine(row + ", " + col + ": flat = " + flatIndex + ", restored = ("
7674  + rowCalc + ", " + colCalc + "), el. = " + elementFlat);
7675  if (flatIndex != iFlat)
7676  {
7677  ret = false;
7678  Console.WriteLine(" Error (" + row + ", " + col + "): Calculated flat index (" + flatIndex
7679  + ") different from actual one (" + flatIndex + ").");
7680  }
7681  if (rowCalc != row || colCalc != col)
7682  {
7683  ret = false;
7684  Console.WriteLine(" Error (" + row + ", " + col + "): Calculated indices from flat form ("
7685  + rowCalc + ", " + colCalc + ") don't match original indices.");
7686  }
7687  if (flatIndex != iFlat)
7688  {
7689  ret = false;
7690  Console.WriteLine(" Error (" + row + ", " + col + "): Calculated flat index (" + flatIndex
7691  + ") different from actual one (" + flatIndex + ").");
7692  }
7693  ++ iFlat;
7694  }
7695  Console.WriteLine("... test done " + (ret?"successfully.":" with ERRORS.") + Environment.NewLine);
7696  return ret;
7697  }
7698 
7699 
7700  #endregion Testing
7701 
7702 
7703  } // abstract class MatrixBase
7704 
7705 
7710  public abstract class MatrixStore<T> : ObjectStore<T>, ILockable
7711  where T: class, IMatrix
7712  {
7713 
7715  protected MatrixStore(): base()
7716  { }
7717 
7721  public MatrixStore(int rowCount, int columnCount)
7722  : this()
7723  {
7724  this._rowCount = rowCount;
7725  this._columnCount = columnCount;
7726  }
7727 
7732  public MatrixStore(int rowCount, int columnCount, bool constrainDimensions)
7733  : this(rowCount, columnCount)
7734  {
7735  this._constrainDimensions = constrainDimensions;
7736  }
7737 
7740  protected bool _constrainDimensions = true;
7741 
7743  public bool ConstrainDimensions
7744  {
7745  get { lock (Lock) { return _constrainDimensions; } }
7746  set { lock (Lock) {
7747  bool checkEligible = false;
7748  if (_constrainDimensions == false && value == true)
7749  checkEligible = true;
7750  _constrainDimensions = value;
7751  if (checkEligible)
7752  ClearIneligible();
7753  } }
7754  }
7755 
7756  protected int _rowCount, _columnCount;
7757 
7761  public int RowCount
7762  {
7763  get { lock (Lock) { return RowCount; } }
7764  set
7765  {
7766  lock (Lock)
7767  {
7768  bool checkEligible = false;
7769  if (value != _rowCount && _constrainDimensions)
7770  checkEligible = true;
7771  _rowCount = value;
7772  if (checkEligible)
7773  ClearIneligible();
7774  }
7775  }
7776  }
7777 
7781  public int ColumnCount
7782  {
7783  get { lock (Lock) { return _columnCount; } }
7784  set
7785  {
7786  lock (Lock)
7787  {
7788  bool checkEligible = false;
7789  if (value != _columnCount && _constrainDimensions)
7790  checkEligible = true;
7791  _columnCount = value;
7792  if (checkEligible)
7793  ClearIneligible();
7794  }
7795  }
7796  }
7797 
7800  public override bool IsEligible(T mat)
7801  {
7802  lock (Lock)
7803  {
7804  bool ret = true;
7805  if (_constrainDimensions)
7806  {
7807  if (mat == null)
7808  ret = false;
7809  else if (mat.RowCount != _rowCount || mat.ColumnCount != _columnCount)
7810  ret = false;
7811  }
7812  return ret;
7813  }
7814  }
7815 
7816  } // MatrixStore<T>
7817 
7818 
7822  public class MatrixStore : MatrixStore<Matrix>, ILockable
7823  {
7824 
7826  protected MatrixStore()
7827  : base()
7828  { }
7829 
7833  public MatrixStore(int rowCount, int columnCount)
7834  : base(rowCount, columnCount)
7835  { }
7836 
7841  public MatrixStore(int rowCount, int columnCount, bool constrainDimensions)
7842  : base(rowCount, columnCount, constrainDimensions)
7843  { }
7844 
7847  protected override Matrix TryGetNew()
7848  {
7849  if (_rowCount > 0 && _columnCount > 0)
7850  {
7851  return new Matrix(_rowCount, _columnCount);
7852  }
7853  else
7854  return null;
7855  }
7856 
7857  } // class MatrixStore
7858 
7859 
7860 }
7861
